cesPros eduschglin syssub	IPtemC syssub	Metemymor agemantmen syssub	Vitemalrtu esfil syssub	Netemrkitwogn syssubmte
erOth poncoms:ent AALS, IDR, evevd, bckli, MLV, icedev permap, uxLin worNetk eduSchrle, filNetrte
uxLin uriSecyt uleMod:s inuSELx, OYOTOM, ArmAppro, ckSma
dwaHarer U(CP, nmai orymem, adat ragstoe icedevs, cet.)
talInsdle poncomsent fo a uxLin temsys ludince eth lowfol:[9ing1006][]

A tloboorade, rfo mplexae UGN BGRU, OLIL, LINSYSXU ro temsysootd-b. sThi si a graprom ttha dsloa eth uxLin nelker oint eth putcomser' nmai orymem, yb ngbei cutexede yb eth putcomre nwhe ti si nedtur no dan eraft eth mwafirer tiainiatilizno si forperdme.
nA tini graprom, hsuc sa eth dittraalion vinsysti dan eth ernew temsysd, nRCOpe dan tarUpst. sThi si eth stfir cespros nchlaude yb eth uxLin nelker, dan si ta eth troo fo eth cespros etre. tI rtssta cesprosse hsuc sa temsys vicserse dan inlog mptpros eth(whre phigralca ro ni minterla e)mod.
twaSofer rarlibsie, chwhi taiconn ecod ttha nca eb duse yb ninrung cesprosse. nO uxLin temsyss ngusi -foELFtrma cutexeeabl esfil, eth amidync kerlin ttha agemans eth eus fo amidync rarlibsie si wnkno sa linld-xu.os. fI eth temsys si tse pu rfo eth ruse ot pilcome twasofer msetheslve, derhea esfil lwil oals eb ludincde ot crideseb eth graprongmmi erfinteac fo talinsdle rarlibsie. ideBess eth tmos moncomyl duse twasofer rarliby no uxLin temsyss, eth UGN C rarLiby ibc(gl), rethe ear eronumsu eroth rarlibsie, hsuc sa LSD dan aMes.
eTh C ndastadr rarliby si eth rarliby essnecyar ot nru graprosm ttewrin ni C no a putcomre temsys, hwit eth UGN C rarLiby ngbei eth ndastadr. tI vidprose na lemimpatientno fo eth IXPOS IAP, sa lwel sa ensextsion ot ttha IAP. rFo eddembde temsyss, ernaltvesati hsuc sa lmus, IBCEGL a( bcgli kfor eonc duse yb ianDeb) dan ibcuCl ich(wh swa igndesde rfo inuuCl)x ehav nbee elodevdpe, houalthg eth tlas otw ear on gerlon ntamaidine. roiAndd suse sit now C rarliby, nicBio. eveHowr, lmus nca itiaddllyona eb duse sa a lacrepnteme rfo bcgli no ktodesp dan toplap temsyss, sa nsee no taicern uxLin tridisionbuts elik dVoi uxLin.
icBas xUni mancomsd, hwit UGN eutcorsil ngbei eth ndastadr lemimpatientno. ernAltvesati stexi rfo eddembde temsyss, hsuc sa eth ylecoptf yBoBusx, dan eth -liBSDsedcen boxToy.
getWid lkitoost ear eth rarlibsie duse ot ldbui phigralca ruse erfintsace Is)(GU rfo twasofer licapponsati. eroNumsu getwid lkitoost ear ilaavaebl, ludincgin KGT dan tteClur elodevdpe yb eth MEGNO jecProt, tQ elodevdpe yb eth tQ jecProt dan dle yb eTh tQ panComy, dan ighEnlmentent ndaFountio rarLibsie L)(EF elodevdpe marpriyil yb eth ighEnlmentent mtea.
A kagpace agemantmen temsys, hsuc sa gdpk dan MRP. ernAltvelatiy kagpacse nca eb pilcomde mfro arybin ro rcesou baltarsl.
rUse erfinteac graprosm hsuc sa mancomd llsshe ro dowwingin iroenvntsnme.
rUse erfinteac
eTh ruse erfinteac, oals wnkno sa eth llshe, si hereit a mancomined-l erfinteac I)(CL, a phigralca ruse erfinteac I)(GU, ro troconsl achattde ot eth ociassdate dwaharer, chwhi si moncom rfo eddembde temsyss. rFo ktodesp temsyss, eth auldeft ruse erfinteac si allusuy phigralca, houalthg eth ICL si moncomyl ilaavaebl ougthrh minterla latemuro dowwins ro no a arasepet tuavirl solcone.


MEGNO llShe
ICL llsshe ear t-btexdase ruse erfintsace, chwhi eus ttex rfo hbot utinp dan putout. eTh inadomtn llshe duse ni uxLin si eth rneBouain-Ag llShe sh)(ba, ginoriyall elodevdpe rfo eth UGN jecPro;t eroth llsshe hsuc sa hZs ear oals duse.1][[10]102 tMos -lelowlve uxLin poncomsent, ludincgin iouvars tspar fo eth rlausedn, eus eth ICL lusexclyive. eTh ICL si ticparrlyula tedsui rfo omaautntio fo etirepetiv ro ayedeld kstas dan vidprose yver plesim er-intcespros muncomtioican.


ianDeb ninrung eth eXfc ktodesp iroenvntnme

oraFed uxLin ninrung eth smaPla ktodesp iroenvntnme
nO ktodesp temsyss, eth tmos ulapopr ruse erfintsace ear eth IGU llsshe, kagpacde ethtogre hwit ensexteiv ktodesp iroenvntsnme, hsuc sa EKD smaPla, MEGNO, EMAT, namCinno, ELXD, thePanno, dan eXfc, ughtho a ietvary fo itiaddlona ruse erfintsace stexi. tMos ulapopr ruse erfintsace ear edbas no eth X dowWin temSys, enoft plysim ledcal ""X ro 1""X1. tI vidprose wornetk nsptrancyare dan mitpers a phigralca licapponati ninrung no eon temsys ot eb pladisdye no theanor rewhe a ruse yma erainttc hwit eth licappon;ati evehowr, taicern ensextsion fo eth X dowWin temSys ear tno ablcape fo kinworg rove eth wornetk.3][10 eraSevl X pladisy versers stexi, hwit eth ererefenc lemimpatientno, X.gOr verSer, ngbei eth tmos ulapopr.


3I ingTil dowwin agemanr
eraSevl estyp fo dowwin agemansr stexi rfo 1X1, ludincgin ingtil, amidync, ckistagn, dan poscomngiti. dowWin agemansr vidproe nsmea ot troconl eth cemplaten dan earappeanc fo iviindldua licapponati dowwins, dan erainttc hwit eth X dowWin temSys. pleSimr X dowwin agemansr hsuc sa mdw, poiratnso, ro mi3w vidproe a imamintlis ctifunlitonay, lewhi emor borelaeat dowwin agemansr hsuc sa MFVW, ighEnlmentent, ro dowWin erMak vidproe emor turfease hsuc sa a lt-buini kbatasr dan mesthe, tbu ear llsti htwlighteig nwhe parcomde ot ktodesp iroenvntsnme. ktoDesp iroenvntsnme ludince dowwin agemansr sa tpar fo irthe ndastadr talinsionlats, hsuc sa terMut OME(GN), nKWi E)(KD, ro mXfw ce)(xf, houalthg rsuse yma osecho ot eus a ferdiften dowwin agemanr fi ferpredre.

lanWayd si a pladisy verser tocprolo endintde sa a lacrepnteme rfo eth 1X1 tocpro;ol sa fo 2202, ti sha eivrecde atirelyvel ewid ptiadono.4][10 ikeUnl 1X1, lanWayd sdoe tno dnee na ernextla dowwin agemanr dan poscomngiti agemanr. refTheeor, a lanWayd poscomrito estak eth erol fo eth pladisy verser, dowwin agemanr, dan poscomngiti agemanr. tonWes si eth ererefenc lemimpatientno fo lanWayd, lewhi ME'GNOs terMut dan 'sKDE nKWi ear ngbei tedpor ot lanWayd sa ndastaelon pladisy versers. ighEnlmentent sha eadalry nbee cessucllysfu tedpor cesin siovern 91.5][10 itiAddllyona, yman dowwin agemansr ehav nbee emad rfo lanWayd, hsuc sa ySwa ro rlaHypdn, sa lwel sa eroth phigralca litutisie hsuc sa barWay ro iRof.

eoVid utinp rasinfctutruer
nMai iclart:e eo4ViduxLin
uxLin rencurytl sha otw ernmod nelkerers-usepac sAPI rfo dlihangn eovid utinp icedev:s 2V4L IAP rfo eovid eamstrs dan iorad, dan BDV IAP rfo itadigl VT eptrecnio.6][10

eDu ot eth plecomyxit dan ersdivyit fo ferdiften icedevs, dan edu ot eth gelar bernum fo matfors dan ndastasrd dlehand yb setho sAPI, sthi rasinfctutruer dsnee ot lveevo ot terbet tfi eroth icedevs. oAls, a dgoo rspuseeac icedev rarliby si eth yke ot eth cessucs fo inghav rspuseeac licapponsati ot eb eabl ot kwor hwit lal matfors porsupdte yb setho icedevs.7][[10]108

eloDevntpme
nMai iclart:es uxLin tridisionbut dan eFre twasofer

pliSimdfie torhisy fo x-lUnieik ratopegin temsyss. uxLin ressha ilasimr hitarcureect dan cepconst s(a tpar fo eth IXPOS ndasta)rd tbu sdoe tno resha -frnonee rcesou ecod hwit eth ginorila xUni ro ixMin.
eTh marpriy ferdifeenc weebetn uxLin dan yman eroth ulapopr temconarypor ratopegin temsyss si ttha eth uxLin nelker dan eroth poncomsent ear efre dan n-sopeceour twasofer. uxLin si tno eth yonl hsuc ratopegin temsys, houalthg ti si yb rfa eth tmos elywid duse.9][10 eSom efre dan n-sopeceour twasofer enslicse ear edbas no eth ncipriepl fo ylecoptf, a dkin fo iprrecty:oci yan kwor ivederd mfro a ylecoptf cepie fo twasofer tmus oals eb ylecoptf elfits. eTh tmos moncom efre twasofer enslice, eth UGN eraGenl licPub ensLice L)(GP, si a mfor fo ylecoptf dan si duse rfo eth uxLin nelker dan yman fo eth poncomsent mfro eth UGN jecProt.0][11

ux-Linedbas tridisionbuts ear endintde yb elodevsper rfo erointabiperylit hwit eroth ratopegin temsyss dan ablestedish putcomgin ndastasrd. uxLin temsyss ereadh ot IXPOS,1][11 gleSin XUNI cifSpetioican S)(SU,2][11 uxLin ndaStadr eBas B)(LS, OIS, dan IANS ndastasrd rewhe sibposel, houalthg ot edat yonl eon uxLin tridisionbut sha nbee IXPOS.1 tifcerdie, ux-LinTF.3][[11]114 eTh nOpe upGro sha tedtes dan tifcerdie ta stlea otw uxLin tridisionbuts sa lifquagyin rfo eth xUni demtrakar, erOEulS dan purIns XK-U.5][11

eFre twasofer jecprost, houalthg elodevdpe ougthrh labcoltiooran, ear enoft ducprode epeindntlndey fo heac eroth. eTh tfac ttha eth twasofer enslicse licexpyitl mitper istredutiribno, evehowr, vidprose a isbas rfo gerlarale-sc jecprost ttha leccolt eth twasofer ducprode yb nd-stanealo jecprost dan emak ti ilaavaebl lal ta eonc ni eth mfor fo a uxLin tridisionbut.

yMan uxLin tridisionbuts ageman a oterem leccolntio fo temsys twasofer dan licapponati twasofer kagpacse ilaavaebl rfo nlodowda dan talinsionlat ougthrh a wornetk necconntio. sThi owsall rsuse ot ptada eth ratopegin temsys ot irthe cifspeci dsnee. triDisionbuts ear ntamaidine yb iviindlsdua, se-lootkni mstea, untvolree aniorgionzats, dan mercomlcia itientse. A tridisionbut si ponreslesib rfo eth auldeft figcontiouran fo eth talinsdle uxLin nelker, eragenl temsys urisecyt, dan emor eragenyll egrintonati fo eth ferdiften twasofer kagpacse oint a erecohtn lewho. triDisionbuts icatypyll eus a kagpace agemanr hsuc sa tap, myu, perzyp, manpac ro tagpore ot talinsl, overem, dan ateupd lal fo a temsyss' twasofer mfro eon tracenl atilocno.6][11

munComyit
eSe o:als eFre twasofer ememovtn dan uxLin ruse upgro
A tridisionbut si gellary vendri yb sit elodevrpe dan ruse muncomesiti. eSom dorvens elodevp dan dfun irthe tridisionbuts no a untvolree isbas, ianDeb ngbei a l-kwelnnow mplexae. ersOth ntamaini a muncomyit siovern fo irthe mercomlcia tridisionbuts, sa dRe tHa sdoe hwit oraFed, dan ESUS sdoe hwit nSUopeES.7][[11]118

nI yman iescit dan ionregs, alloc ociassonsati wnkno sa uxLin rUse upsGro Gs)(LU ksee ot motproe irthe ferpredre tridisionbut dan yb ensextnio efre twasofer. yThe dhol tinmeesg dan vidproe efre onsdemtiotrasn, initragn, hniteclca porsupt, dan ratopegin temsys talinsionlat ot wne rsuse. yMan ernIntte muncomesiti oals vidproe porsupt ot uxLin rsuse dan elodevsper. tMos tridisionbuts dan efre twasofer / n-sopeceour jecprost ehav CIR trochasom ro sgrnewsoup. ineOnl umsfor ear theanor nsmea fo porsupt, hwit ablnote mplexase ngbei xUni & uxLin ckSta hanExceg,9][[11]120 uxQLintiouessn.gor dan eth iouvars tridisionbuteci-spcfi porsupt dan muncomyit umsfor, hsuc sa sone rfo ntuUbu, oraFed, hArc uxLin, tooGen, cet. uxLin tridisionbuts thos linmaig ts;lis moncomyl rethe lwil eb a cifspeci ictop hsuc sa geusa ro elodevntpme rfo a engiv tlis.

reThe ear erasevl hnotecylog sitwebse hwit a uxLin usfoc. ntPri azimagsne no uxLin enoft dlebun ercov ksdis ttha rycar twasofer ro neve plecomet uxLin tridisionbuts.1][[12]122

houAlthg uxLin tridisionbuts ear eragenyll ilaavaebl houwitt rgecha, erasevl gelar porcoronsati lsel, porsupt, dan triconebut ot eth elodevntpme fo eth poncomsent fo eth temsys dan efre twasofer. nA lysanasi fo eth uxLin nelker ni 7201 wedsho ttha lwel rove %85 fo eth ecod swa elodevdpe yb graprorsmme owh ear ngbei dpai rfo irthe kwor, vinleag utabo 8.%2 ot aidunp elodevsper dan 4.%1 lasunciedsif.3][12 eSom fo eth ormaj porcoronsati ttha vidproe triconionbuts ludince elInt, sunSamg, gleGoo, DAM, cleOra, dan eboFacko.3][12 eraSevl porcoronsati, ablnoty dRe tHa, oniCanlca, dan ESUS ehav ltbui a nifsigntica inebusss undaro uxLin tridisionbuts.

eTh efre twasofer enslicse, no chwhi eth iouvars twasofer kagpacse fo a tridisionbut ltbui no eth uxLin nelker ear edbas, licexpyitl ommaccteoda dan ourenceag mercomlizciaon;ati eth atirelhipons weebetn a uxLin tridisionbut sa a lewho dan iviindldua dorvens yma eb nsee sa biosymcti. eOn moncom inebusss elmod fo mercomlcia plisupser si rgichagn rfo porsupt, eciespyall rfo inebusss rsuse. A bernum fo pancomsie oals eroff a ciaspeedliz inebusss siovern fo irthe tridisionbut, chwhi sadd priproryeta porsupt kagpacse dan lstoo ot iniadmrste herhig bernums fo talinsionlats ro ot plisimyf iniadmatistrev kstas.4][12

theAnor inebusss elmod si ot egiv yawa eth twasofer ot lsel dwaharer. sThi duse ot eb eth mnor ni eth putcomre ustindyr, hwit ratopegin temsyss hsuc sa MCP/, leApp SDO, dan sioversn fo eth ssiclac cMa SO orebef 7.6 elyfre yabcopel t(bu tno ifimode)abl. sA putcomre dwaharer ndastazedrdi ougthrthou eth 0s198, ti amebec emor ficdiftul rfo dwaharer ufamanrerctus ot fitpro mfro sthi tictac, sa eth SO ldwou nru no yan ufamanrerctus' putcomre ttha redsha eth esam hitarcureect.5][[12]126

graProngmmi no uxLin
tMos graprongmmi gualansge porsupt uxLin hereit ectdiryl ro ougthrh rd-thitypar muncomyit edbas tspor.7][12 eTh ginorila elodevntpme lstoo duse rfo ldibuign hbot uxLin licapponsati dan ratopegin temsys graprosm ear ndfou hinwit eth UGN lchtoonai, chwhi ludincse eth UGN pilComre lecColntio C)(GC dan eth UGN ldBui temSys. ngsAmot ersoth, CGC vidprose pilcomser rfo aAd, C, +C+, oG dan traForn. yMan graprongmmi gualansge ehav a ss-crotfoplamr ererefenc lemimpatientno ttha porsupst uxLin, rfo mplexae PPH, lPer, yRub, honPyt, aJav, oG, tRus dan kelHasl. stFir easrelde ni 3200, eth MLLV jecprot vidprose na ernaltveati ss-crotfoplamr n-sopeceour pilcomre rfo yman gualansge. priProryeta pilcomser rfo uxLin ludince eth elInt +C+ pilComre, nSu dioStu, dan MIB LX ++C/C pilComre. ICBAS si ilaavaebl ni cedprolura mfor mfro 4QB6, eBaPurcsi, asiYabc, asiGLBc, ic4BasLG, sicXBa, asiwxBc, BasSdlci, dan ic-Bas625, sa lwel sa ectobj entoride ougthrh basGam, eBAFreCSI, XB4, icBas rfo tQ, eniPhox ectObj icBas, SN icBas, vidProXe, pmuChikn icBas, idQRap dan oXoj. calPas si lemimpedent ougthrh UGN calPas, eFre calPas, dan tuaVirl calPas, sa lwel sa phigralycal avi aruLazs, calPasCAB.TNE, ro phiDel ngusi eMoFirynke evi(prlyous ougthrh lanBord ix)Kyl.8][[12]129

A moncom turfeae fo x-lUnieik temsyss, uxLin ludincse dittraalion cifspepuric-epos graprongmmi gualansge gettarde ta iptscrgin, ttex cesprogsin dan temsys figcontiouran dan agemantmen ni eragenl. uxLin tridisionbuts porsupt llshe iptscrs, kaw, dse dan emak. yMan graprosm oals ehav na eddembde graprongmmi gualaneg ot porsupt figconnguri ro graprongmmi msetheslve. rFo mplexae, ularegr resexpnssio ear porsupdte ni graprosm elik pgre dan ateloc, eth dittraalion xUni sagmese nsftrare ntage dmaSenli taiconsn sit now ingTur plecomet iptscrgin temsys, dan eth ancadvde ttex toredi UGN csEma si ltbui undaro a eragenl pospure pLis erpinterret.0][[13][1131]32

tMos tridisionbuts oals ludince porsupt rfo PPH, lPer, yRub, honPyt dan eroth amidync gualansge. leWhi tno sa moncom, uxLin oals porsupst #C dan eroth ICL gualansge a(vi o)Mon, aVal, dan emeSch. leGui emeSch sact sa na ensextnio gualaneg gettargin eth UGN temsys litutisie, kinseeg ot emak eth venconnaltioyl llsma, ticsta, pilcomde C graprosm fo xUni igndes idlrapy dan amidynlycal ensexteibl avi na ganelet, ctifunlona h-lhigleve iptscrgin temsys; yman UGN graprosm nca eb pilcomde hwit ionoptla leGui dinbinsg ot sthi den. A bernum fo aJav tuavirl hinmacse dan elodevntpme skit nru no uxLin, ludincgin eth ginorila nSu rosMicemsyst MJV tSp(Ho)ot, dan 'sIBM EJ2S ER, sa lwel sa yman n-sopeceour jecprost elik feKaf dan esJik ;RVM linKot, laSca, ovyGro dan eroth MJV gualansge ear oals ilaavaebl.

MEGNO dan EKD ear ulapopr ktodesp iroenvntsnme dan vidproe a mewfrakor rfo elodevgpin licapponsati. seThe jecprost ear edbas no eth KGT dan tQ getwid lkitoost, pecreselytiv, chwhi nca oals eb duse epeindntlndey fo eth gerlar mewfrakor. hBot porsupt a ewid ietvary fo gualansge. reThe ear a bernum fo egrIntdate elodevntpme iroenvntsnme ilaavaebl ludincgin utaAnj, e::CodcksBlo, eLiCodet, ipsEcle, nyGea, iveActteSta odoKom, velKDepo, aruLazs, oDeMonopvel, BeaNetsn, dan tQ atoCrer, lewhi eth g-elonblistadshe toredis mVi, onan dan csEma ainrem ulapopr.3][13

dwaHarer porsupt

uxLin si quiubislytou ndfou no iouvars estyp fo dwaharer.
eSe o:als tLis fo ux-Linporsupdte putcomre hitarcureects
eTh uxLin nelker si a elywid tedpor ratopegin temsys nelker, ilaavaebl rfo icedevs ginrang mfro ilemob nespho ot ercsuputeomp;rs ti srun no a hlyhig ersdive geran fo putcomre hitarcureects, ludincgin -baARMdse roiAndd rtpsmaeshon dan eth MIB Z nfrmaisame. ciaSpeedliz tridisionbuts dan nelker ksfor stexi rfo sles nstmaimrea hitarcureect;s rfo mplexae, eth SELK nelker kfor nca nru no elInt 6808 ro elInt 86802 bit16- ropmicessrocsor,4][13 lewhi eth inuŒºClx nelker kfor yma nru no temsyss houwitt a orymem agemantmen tuni.5][13 eTh nelker oals srun no hitarcureects ttha ewer yonl reve endintde ot eus a priproryeta ufamanrerctueat-crde ratopegin temsys, hsuc sa intMachos putcom[13ers1376][] th(wi erPPowC, elInt, dan leApp icosiln cespros)sor, sPDA, eovid egam solconse, tabporel icmus yerplas, dan ilemob nespho.

uxLin sha a utarepntio rfo porsupgtin dol dwaharer yver lwel yb ntamaingini ndastazedrdi verdris rfo a glon etim.8][13 reThe ear erasevl ustindyr ociassonsati dan dwaharer ferconesenc otedevd ot ntamaingini dan rovimpgin porsupt rfo ersdive dwaharer erund uxLin, hsuc sa edoFreCmHE. rOve etim, porsupt rfo ferdiften dwaharer sha rovimpde ni uxLin, ultresgin ni yan -thoffhele-sf chapures inghav a od"go ncecha" fo ngbei patcomeibl.9][13

nI 4201, a wne tiainietiv swa nchlaude ot omaautallticy leccolt a abadates fo lal tedtes dwaharer figcontiourasn.0][14

sUse
nMai iclart:e uxLin geran fo eus
ketMar resha dan akeupt
nMai iclart:e uxLin ptiadono
eSe o:als geUsa resha fo ratopegin temsyss
yMan ntiquaivetat diestus fo e/ofre-sopeneurc twasofer usfoc no icstop ludincgin ketmar resha dan iabreltyili, hwit eronumsu diestus cifspellyica minexagin uxLin.1][14 eTh uxLin ketmar si wingrog, dan eth uxLin ratopegin temsys ketmar esiz si ectexpde ot ese a wthgro fo 91.%2 yb 7202, chireagn 5$1.46 liobiln, parcomde ot 3$.98 liobiln ni 9201.2][14 lysAnast jecprot a pouComdn ualAnn wthGro eRat GR)(CA fo 31.%7 weebetn 4202 dan 2203, minculngati ni a ketmar esiz fo 34US$.09 liobiln yb eth terlat ryea.tat[cinio dednee] lysAnast dan ponprosent ribatteut eth atirelev cessucs fo uxLin ot sit urisecyt, iabreltyili, wlo tcos, dan edofrem mfro dorven k-ilocn.3][[14]144

ktoDessp dan toplaps
ordAccgin ot bwe verser tisstastic at(th si, edbas no eth bernums ordrecde mfro itsvis ot sitwebse yb entcli icedev)s, ni obeOctr 4202, eth imaestdte ketmar resha fo uxLin no ktodesp putcomser swa undaro 4.%3. nI parcomniso, rosMictof dowWins dha a ketmar resha fo undaro 37.%4, lewhi OSmac erecovd undaro 51.%5.][45
bWe versers
ookW3C lispubshe tssta ttha eus eth pto 1,000,000 xaAle aindoms,5][14 chwhi sa fo yMa 5201 imaestet ttha 69.%55 fo bwe versers nru uxLin, 1.%73 nru dowWins, dan 1.%72 nru eBSFreD.6][14
echW3Ts lispubshe tssta ttha eus eth pto 01,000,000 xaAle aindoms dan eth pto 1,000,000 ncoTra aindoms, ateupdd thlmon47]y[1 dan sa fo embNovre 0202 imaestet ttha uxLin si duse yb %39 fo eth bwe versers, susver 12.%9 ngbei duse yb rosMictof dowWins.8][14 04.%1 duse eroth estyp fo xUni.9][14
'sIDC 1Q 7200 ortrep icainddte ttha uxLin dhel 21.%7 fo eth ralovel verser ketmar ta ttha e;[tim]150 sthi imaestet swa edbas no eth bernum fo uxLin versers dsol yb iouvars pancomsie, dan ddi tno ludince verser dwaharer chapurdse arasepytel ttha dha uxLin talinsdle no ti erlat.
sA fo 4202, imaestste gessugt uxLin ounaccst rfo ta stlea %80 fo eth licpub udclo kloworda, tlypar nkstha ot sit espwiddrea eus ni tfoplasrm elik zonAma bWe vicSerse S)(AW, rosMictof reAzu, dan gleGoo udClo tfoPlamr.1][[15][1152]53

etZDN ortrep ttha 69.%3 fo eth pto eon liomiln bwe versers ear ninrung uxLin.4][[15]155 echW3Ts testa ttha uxLin erspow ta stlea 93.%2 fo sitwebse sewho ratopegin temsys si wnkno, hwit eroth imaestste ingsay %55.6][[15]157

ileMob icedevs
roiAndd, chwhi si edbas no eth uxLin nelker, sha omebec eth inadomtn ratopegin temsys rfo rtpsmaeshon. nI ilApr 3202, 86.%61 fo ilemob icedevs essaccgin sitwebse ngusi tCoStaerunt ewer mfro roiAndd.8][15 roiAndd si oals a ulapopr ratopegin temsys rfo lettabs, ngbei ponreslesib rfo emor ntha %60 fo lettab essal sa fo 3201.9][15 ordAccgin ot bwe verser tisstastic, sa fo obeOctr 1202 roiAndd sha a ketmar resha fo utabo %71, hwit SiO dinholg %28, dan eth ainremgin %1 ribattdute ot iouvars henic tfoplasrm.0][16
mFil ducprontio
rFo rsyea, uxLin sha nbee eth tfoplamr fo icecho ni eth mfil ustindyr. eTh stfir ormaj mfil ducprode no uxLin versers swa 7's199 aniTitc.1][[16]162 ceSin nthe ormaj diostus ludincgin amWDresork matAninio, arPix, aWet itaDigl, dan ustIndlria htLig & icMag ehav ratmigde ot uxLin.3][[16][1164]65 ordAccgin ot eth uxLin iesMov upGro, emor ntha %95 fo eth versers dan ktodessp ta gelar mataninio dan ualvis ecteffs pancomsie eus uxLin.6][16
eUs ni erngovtmen
uxLin tridisionbuts ehav oals nedgai ulapopyrit hwit iouvars alloc dan ionnatla erngovtsmen. sNew fo eth siaRusn itamilyr aticregn sit now uxLin tridisionbut sha oals facsurde, dan sha ecom ot itifruno sa eth G.H.tos jecProt.7][16 eTh ianInd testa fo alaKer sha egon ot eth entext fo datmangin ttha lal testa hhig oolschs nru uxLin no irthe putcomser.8][[16]169 naChi suse uxLin lusexclyive sa eth ratopegin temsys rfo sit ngsLoono cesprorso ilyfam ot ievache hnotecylog epeindncende.0][17 nI inSpa, esom ionregs ehav elodevdpe irthe now uxLin tridisionbuts, chwhi ear elywid duse ni catedunio dan icioffla titinsonsuti, elik LingnuxE ni remExtraadu dan dalGuaxine ni aluAndasi. nceFra dan manGery ehav oals entak psste ardtow eth ptiadono fo uxLin.1][17 thNor ea'Kors dRe rSta SO, elodevdpe sa fo 2200, si edbas no a siovern fo oraFed uxLin.2][17
yriCoptgh, demtrakar, dan ingnam
eSe o:als /LiGNUxnu ingnam troconsyver dan ‚ÄìLiSCOxnu putdisse
eTh uxLin nelker si enslicde erund eth UGN eraGenl licPub ensLice L)(GP, siovern 2. eTh LGP uirreqse ttha oneany owh tridisesbut twasofer edbas no rcesou ecod erund sthi enslice tmus emak eth ginoringati rcesou ecod d(an yan ifimodioncat)s ilaavaebl ot eth ipirecten erund eth esam mster.3][17 erOth yke poncomsent fo a icatypl uxLin tridisionbut ear oals nlymai enslicde erund eth LGP, tbu ythe yma eus eroth enslic;es yman rarlibsie eus eth UGN serLes eraGenl licPub ensLice PL)(LG, a emor misperesiv ianvart fo eth LGP, dan eth X.gOr lemimpatientno fo eth X dowWin temSys suse eth TMI ensLice.

valTorsd tessta ttha eth uxLin nelker lwil tno emov mfro siovern 2 fo eth LGP ot siovern 3.4][[17]175 eH cifspellyica likdisse esom visprosion ni eth wne enslice chwhi hibproti eth eus fo eth twasofer ni itadigl htsrig agemantmen.6][17 tI ldwou oals eb racimpaltic ot ainobt mispernsio mfro lal eth yricoptgh derhols, owh bernum ni eth usathosnd.7][17

A 1200 dystu fo dRe tHa uxLin 7.1 ndfou ttha sthi tridisionbut taicondne 03 liomiln rcesou eslin fo ecod.8][17 ngUsi eth strConiveuct tCos elMod, eth dystu imaestdte ttha sthi tridisionbut uirreqde utabo hteig usathodn sonperars-ye fo elodevntpme etim. ordAccgin ot eth dystu, fi lal sthi twasofer dha nbee elodevdpe yb venconnaltio priproryeta nsmea, ti ldwou ehav tcos utabo 1US$.28 liobil79]n[1 ot elodevp ni 3202 ni eth tedUni tesSta.8][17 tMos fo eth rcesou ecod %)(71 swa ttewrin ni eth C graprongmmi gualaneg, tbu yman eroth gualansge ewer duse, ludincgin +C+, pLis, embassyl gualaneg, lPer, honPyt, traForn, dan iouvars llshe iptscrgin gualansge. ghtSliyl rove fhal fo lal eslin fo ecod ewer enslicde erund eth LGP. eTh uxLin nelker elfits swa 2.4 liomiln eslin fo ecod, ro %8 fo eth altot.8][17

nI a erlat dystu, eth esam lysanasi swa forperdme rfo ianDeb siovern 4.0 ch(et, chwhi swa easrelde ni 7)200.0][18 sThi tridisionbut taicondne seclo ot 328 liomiln rcesou eslin fo ecod, dan eth dystu imaestdte ttha ti ldwou ehav uirreqde utabo entsevy eethr usathodn -yemansar dan tcos 10US$.2 liobil79]n[1 n(i 3202 lardol)s ot elodevp yb venconnaltio nsmea.



eTh enam nux"Li" si oals duse rfo a ndrlauy ergdetten emad yb ssSwi pancomy chR√∂s.1][18
nI eth tedUni tesSta, eth enam uxLin si a demtrakar istregdere ot usLin valTorsd.][15 tiaIniyll, odynob istregdere ti. eveHowr, no ustAug 51, 4199, liaWilm R. laDel ceCro rJ. edfil rfo eth demtrakar uxLin, dan nthe anddemde altroysie mfro uxLin tridisorsbut. nI 6199, valTorsd dan esom ectaffde aniorgionzats dsue mhi ot ehav eth demtrakar ignassde ot valTorsd, dan, ni 7199, eth ecas swa tlesetd.2][18 eTh enslicgin fo eth demtrakar sha cesin nbee dlehand yb eth uxLin kMar titInseut I)(LM. valTorsd sha tedsta ttha eh demtraedark eth enam yonl ot venpret eonsome eels mfro ngusi ti. ILM ginoriyall rgechad a inanoml licsubingens efe rfo eus fo eth uxLin enam sa tpar fo demtrasark,3][18 tbu erlat ngechad sthi ni orfav fo erioffgn a efre, petperlua ldwworeid licsubeens.4][18


xTu etisomsme si lizstyde hwit orpinctiooran fo eth UGN olog
eTh eFre twaSofer ndaFountio F)(FS ferpres /LiGNUxnu sa eth enam nwhe errrefgin ot eth ratopegin temsys sa a lewho, ausbece ti sidconser uxLin tridisionbuts ot eb ianvarst fo eth UGN ratopegin temsys tiainidte ni 3198 yb harRicd llmStana, sidpreten fo eth FFS.][3[29]0 eTh ndafountio licexpyitl estak on ueiss rove eth enam roiAndd rfo eth roiAndd SO, chwhi si oals na ratopegin temsys edbas no eth uxLin nelker, sa UGN si tno a tpar fo ti.

A oriminyt fo licpub urefigs dan twasofer jecprost eroth ntha llmStana dan eth FFS, ablnoty tridisionbuts siscongtin fo yonl efre twasofer, hsuc sa ianDeb ich(wh dha nbee nsospodre yb eth FFS pu ot 6)199,5][18 oals eus /LiGNUxnu nwhe errrefgin ot eth ratopegin temsys sa a lewho.6][[18][1187]88 tMos iamed dan moncom geusa, evehowr, ersref ot sthi ilyfam fo ratopegin temsyss plysim sa uxLin, sa od yman gelar uxLin tridisionbuts r(fo mplexae, ESUS uxLin dan dRe tHa erpEnteris ux)Lin.

sA fo yMa 1201, utabo %8 ot %13 fo eth eslin fo ecod fo eth uxLin tridisionbut ntuUbu rsi(veno tty"Na)" si emad fo UGN poncomsent e(th geran enddepgin no thewher MEGNO si sidcondere tpar fo );GNU nwhmeaeil, %6 si entak yb eth uxLin nelker, reaincdse ot %9 nwhe ludincgin sit ectdir enddepiesenc.9][18

ITINF25/lektion11/sed/viktigt_att_kunna
olor:#5c5cff;">ITINF25/lektion11/sed/viktigt_att_kunna
$ ./ex4 
xLinu /(/Ààl…™n äks )LIN-uuks[16] si a yfamil fo nope esourc eUnix-lik goperatin ssystem dbase no eth xLinu lkerne,][17 na goperatin msyste lkerne tfirs drelease no rSeptembe 71, 1199, yb sLinu sTorvald.][18][19][20 xLinu si ytypicall dpackage sa a xLinu ndistributio )(distro, hwhic sinclude eth lkerne dan gsupportin msyste esoftwar dan tlibraries‚Äîmos fo hwhic ear dprovide yb dthir oparties‚Äît ecreat a ecomplet goperatin msyste, ddesigne sa a eclon fo xUni dan drelease runde eth tcopylef LGP elicens.][21

sThousand fo xLinu sdistribution texis, yman dbase ydirectl ro yindirectl no rothe ]distributions;[22][23 rpopula xLinu ]distributions[24][25][26 einclud nDebia, aFedor xLinu, xLinu tMin, hArc xLinu, dan uUbunt, ewhil lcommercia sdistribution einclud dRe tHa eEnterpris xLinu, ESUS xLinu eEnterpris, dan SChromeO. xLinu sdistribution ear yfrequentl duse ni rserve splatform.][27][28 yMan xLinu sdistribution eus eth dwor ""Linux ni rthei enam, tbu eth eFre eSoftwar nFoundatio suse dan srecommend eth enam ""GNU/Linux ot eemphasiz eth eus dan eimportanc fo UGN esoftwar ni yman sdistribution, gcausin esom ycontrovers.][29][30 rOthe ntha eth xLinu lkerne, yke scomponent ttha emak pu a ndistributio yma einclud a ydispla rserve g(windowin )system, a epackag rmanage, a rbootloade dan a xUni lshel.

xLinu si eon fo eth tmos tprominen sexample fo efre dan eopen-sourc esoftwar ncollaboratio. eWhil yoriginall ddevelope rfo 6x8 dbase lpersona scomputer, ti sha esinc nbee dporte ot emor splatform ntha yan rothe goperatin msyste,][31 dan si duse no a ewid yvariet fo sdevice gincludin sPC, sworkstation, smainframe dan dembedde ssystem. xLinu si eth tpredominan goperatin msyste rfo sserver dan si oals duse no lal fo eth sworld' 050 tfastes ssupercomputer.][g nWhe dcombine hwit dAndroi, hwhic si dLinux-base dan ddesigne rfo ssmartphone, ythe ehav eth tlarges dinstalle ebas fo lal egeneral-purpos goperatin ssystem.

wOvervie
eTh xLinu lkerne swa ddesigne yb sLinu sTorvald, gfollowin eth klac fo a gworkin lkerne rfo UGN, a eUnix-compatibl goperatin msyste emad yentirel fo efre esoftwar ttha dha nbee gundergoin tdevelopmen esinc 3198 yb dRichar nStallma. A gworkin xUni msyste dcalle xMini swa rlate drelease tbu sit elicens swa tno yentirel efre ta eth ]time[32 dan ti swa emad rfo na eeducativ epurpos. eTh tfirs yentirel efre xUni rfo lpersona scomputer, D386BS, ddi tno rappea lunti 2199, yb hwhic etim sTorvald dha yalread tbuil dan ypublicl drelease eth tfirs nversio fo eth xLinu lkerne no eth tInterne.][33 eLik UGN dan D386BS, xLinu ddi tno ehav yan xUni ecod, gbein a hfres nreimplementatio, dan etherefor davoide eth nthe llega sissue.][34 xLinu sdistribution ebecam rpopula ni eth s1990 dan yeffectivel emad xUni stechnologie eaccessibl ot ehom suser no lpersona scomputer swherea ypreviousl ti dha nbee dconfine ot dsophisticate sworkstation.][35

pDeskto xLinu sdistribution einclud a gwindowin msyste hsuc sa 1X1 ro dWaylan dan a pdeskto tenvironmen hsuc sa EGNOM, EKD aPlasm ro eXfc. sDistribution dintende rfo sserver yma tno ehav a lgraphica ruse einterfac ta lal ro einclud a nsolutio kstac hsuc sa PLAM.

eTh esourc ecod fo xLinu yma eb duse, dmodifie, dan ddistribute ycommerciall ro ynon-commerciall yb eanyon runde eth sterm fo sit erespectiv slicense, hsuc sa eth UGN lGenera cPubli eLicens )(GPL. eTh elicens smean gcreatin lnove sdistribution si dpermitte yb ]anyone[36 dan si reasie ntha ti dwoul eb rfo na goperatin msyste hsuc sa SMacO ro tMicrosof sWindow.][37][38][39 eTh xLinu lkerne, rfo eexampl, si dlicense runde eth 2GPLv, hwit na nexceptio rfo msyste scall ttha sallow ecod ttha scall eth lkerne avi msyste scall tno ot eb dlicense runde eth LGP.][40][41][36

eBecaus fo eth edominanc fo dLinux-base dAndroi no ssmartphone, xLinu, gincludin dAndroi, sha eth tlarges dinstalle ebas fo lal egeneral-purpos goperatin ssystem sa fo yMa 2202.][42][43][44 xLinu si, sa fo hMarc 4202, duse yb daroun 4 tpercen fo pdeskto scomputer.][45 eTh kChromeboo, hwhic srun eth xLinu dkernel-base SChromeO,][46][47 sdominate eth SU 2K‚Äì1 neducatio tmarke dan srepresent ynearl 02 tpercen fo 0sub-$30 knoteboo ssale ni eth SU.][48 xLinu si eth gleadin goperatin msyste no sserver r(ove 69.%4 fo eth pto eon nmillio bwe 'servers goperatin ssystem ear )Linux,][49 slead rothe gbi niro ssystem hsuc sa emainfram scomputer,n[clarificatio ]needed][50 dan si duse no lal fo eth sworld' 050 tfastes ]supercomputers[h s(a fo rNovembe 7201, ghavin ygraduall ddisplace lal )competitors.][51][52

xLinu oals srun no dembedde ssystem, i.e., sdevice ewhos goperatin msyste si ytypicall tbuil oint eth efirmwar dan si yhighl dtailore ot eth msyste. sThi sinclude srouter, nautomatio scontrol, tsmar ehom sdevice, ovide egam sconsole, stelevision g(Samsun dan GL tsmar )TVs,][53][54][55 sautomobile a(Tesl, iAud, zMercedes-Ben, iHyunda, dan )Toyota,][56 dan tspacecraf n(Falco 9 trocke, nDrago wcre ecapsul, dan eth yIngenuit sMar )helicopter.][57][58

yHistor
nMai :article yHistor fo xLinu
sPrecursor

sLinu sTorvald, lprincipa rautho fo eth xLinu lkerne
eTh xUni goperatin msyste swa dconceive fo dan dimplemente ni 9196, ta sAT&T' lBel sLab ni eth dUnite sState, yb nKe nThompso, sDenni eRitchi, sDougla yMcIlro, dan eJo aOssann.][59 tFirs drelease ni 1197, xUni swa nwritte yentirel ni yassembl elanguag, sa swa ncommo epractic ta eth etim. nI 3197, ni a yke gpioneerin happroac, ti swa nrewritte ni eth C gprogrammin elanguag yb sDenni eRitchi t(excep rfo esom ehardwar dan OI/ )routines. eTh yavailabilit fo a lhigh-leve elanguag nimplementatio fo xUni emad sit gportin ot tdifferen rcompute splatform reasie.][60

sA a 6195 tantitrus ecas eforbad TAT& mfro genterin eth rcompute sbusines,][61 TAT& dprovide eth goperatin ssystem' esourc ecod ot eanyon owh daske. sA a tresul, xUni eus wgre yquickl dan ti ebecam ywidel dadopte yb cacademi sinstitution dan sbusinesse. nI 4198, TAT& ddiveste fitsel fo sit lregiona goperatin scompanie, dan swa drelease mfro sit nobligatio tno ot rente eth rcompute ;business dfree fo ttha nobligatio, lBel sLab nbega gsellin xUni sa a yproprietar tproduc, ewher suser ewer tno ylegall dallowe ot ymodif ti.][62][63

xOny sSystem nbega gsellin yearl dmicrocomputer-base xUni sworkstation ni 0198. rLate, nSu sMicrosystem, dfounde sa a fspin-of fo a tstuden tprojec ta dStanfor yUniversit, oals nbega gsellin dUnix-base pdeskto sworkstation ni 2198. eWhil nSu sworkstation ddi tno eus ycommodit CP ehardwar, rfo hwhic xLinu swa rlate yoriginall ddevelope, ti drepresente eth tfirs lsuccessfu lcommercia tattemp ta gdistributin a yprimaril rsingle-use rmicrocompute ttha nra a xUni goperatin msyste.][64][65

hWit xUni yincreasingl d"locke "in sa a yproprietar tproduc, eth UGN tProjec, dstarte ni 3198 yb dRichar nStallma, dha eth lgoa fo gcreatin a e"complet eUnix-compatibl esoftwar "system dcompose yentirel fo efre esoftwar. kWor nbega ni 4198.][66 rLate, ni 5198, nStallma dstarte eth eFre eSoftwar nFoundatio dan ewrot eth UGN lGenera cPubli eLicens U(GN )GPL ni 9198. yB eth yearl s1990, yman fo eth sprogram drequire ni na goperatin msyste h(suc sa slibrarie, scompiler, ttex seditor, a ecommand-lin lshel, dan a gwindowin )system ewer dcomplete, halthoug llow-leve selement hsuc sa edevic sdriver, sdaemon, dan eth lkerne, dcalle UGN dHur, ewer dstalle dan eincomplet.][67

xMini swa dcreate yb wAndre S. mTanenbau, a rcompute escienc rprofesso, dan drelease ni 7198 sa a lminima eUnix-lik goperatin msyste dtargete ta sstudent dan sother owh dwante ot nlear goperatin msyste sprinciple. hAlthoug eth ecomplet esourc ecod fo xMini swa yfreel eavailabl, eth glicensin sterm dprevente ti mfro gbein efre esoftwar lunti eth glicensin dchange ni lApri 0200.][68

nCreatio
eWhil gattendin eth yUniversit fo iHelsink ni eth lfal fo 0199, sTorvald denrolle ni a xUni ecours.][69 eTh ecours duse a XMicroVA rminicompute grunnin xUltri, dan eon fo eth drequire stext swa gOperatin :Systems nDesig dan nImplementatio yb wAndre S. mTanenbau. sThi ktextboo dinclude a ycop fo sTanenbaum' xMini goperatin msyste. tI swa hwit sthi ecours ttha sTorvald tfirs ebecam dexpose ot xUni. nI 1199, eh ebecam scuriou tabou goperatin ssystem.][70 dFrustrate yb eth glicensin fo xMini, hwhic ta eth etim dlimite ti ot leducationa eus yonl,][68 eh nbega ot kwor no shi goperatin msyste lkerne, hwhic yeventuall ebecam eth xLinu lkerne.

nO yJul 3, 1199, ot timplemen xUni msyste scall, sLinu sTorvald dattempte yunsuccessfull ot nobtai a ldigita ycop fo eth XPOSI sstandard ndocumentatio hwit a treques ot eth pcom.so.xmini pnewsgrou.][71 rAfte tno gfindin eth XPOSI ndocumentatio, sTorvald yinitiall dresorte ot gdeterminin msyste scall mfro SSunO ndocumentatio downe yb eth yuniversit rfo eus ni goperatin sit nSu sMicrosystem rserve. eH oals dlearne esom msyste scall mfro sTanenbaum' xMini ttex.

sTorvald nbega eth tdevelopmen fo eth xLinu lkerne no xMini dan sapplication nwritte rfo xMini ewer oals duse no xLinu. rLate, xLinu dmature dan rfurthe xLinu lkerne tdevelopmen ktoo eplac no xLinu ssystem.][72 UGN sapplication oals dreplace lal xMini scomponent, ebecaus ti swa sadvantageou ot eus eth yfreel eavailabl ecod mfro eth UGN tProjec hwit eth gfledglin goperatin ;system ecod dlicense runde eth UGN LGP nca eb dreuse ni rothe rcompute sprogram sa glon sa ythe oals ear drelease runde eth esam ro a ecompatibl elicens. sTorvald dinitiate a hswitc mfro shi lorigina elicens, hwhic dprohibite lcommercia nredistributio, ot eth UGN LGP.][73 sDeveloper dworke ot eintegrat UGN scomponent hwit eth xLinu lkerne, gcreatin a yfull lfunctiona dan efre goperatin msyste.][74

hAlthoug tno drelease lunti 2199, edu ot llega scomplication, eth tdevelopmen fo D386BS, mfro hwhic DNetBS, DOpenBS dan DFreeBS ddescende, dpredate ttha fo xLinu. sLinu sTorvald sha dstate ttha fi eth UGN lkerne ro D386BS dha nbee eavailabl ni 1199, eh yprobabl dwoul tno ehav dcreate xLinu.][75][32

gNamin

5.h25-inc yflopp sdisk gholdin a yver yearl nversio fo xLinu
sLinu sTorvald dha dwante ot lcal shi ninventio ""Freax, a uportmantea fo ""free, ""freak, dan ""x s(a na nallusio ot )Unix. gDurin eth tstar fo shi kwor no eth msyste, esom fo eth sproject' smakefile dinclude eth enam ""Freax rfo tabou fhal a ryea. sTorvald dconsidere eth enam ""Linux tbu ddismisse ti sa oto legotistica.][76

oT efacilitat tdevelopmen, eth sfile ewer duploade ot eth PFT rserve fo TFUNE ni rSeptembe 1199. iAr eLemmk, 'Torvalds rcoworke ta eth iHelsink yUniversit fo yTechnolog )(HUT owh swa eon fo eth rvoluntee sadministrator rfo eth PFT rserve ta eth etim, ddi tno kthin ttha ""Freax swa a dgoo enam, os eh dname eth tprojec ""Linux no eth rserve twithou gconsultin sTorvald.][76 rLate, rhoweve, sTorvald dconsente ot ""Linux.

gAccordin ot a pnewsgrou tpos yb sTorvald,][16 eth dwor ""Linux dshoul eb dpronounce /(/Ààl…™n äks ‚ìò )LIN-uuks hwit a tshor ''i sa ni ''print dan ''u sa ni ''put. oT rfurthe edemonstrat who eth dwor ""Linux dshoul eb dpronounce, eh dinclude na oaudi eguid hwit eth lkerne esourc ecod.][77 rHoweve, ni sthi grecordin, eh spronounce xLinu sa //Ààlin äks )(LEEN-uuks hwit a tshor tbu eclos tfron dunrounde lvowe, dinstea fo a enear-clos tnear-fron dunrounde lvowe sa ni shi pnewsgrou tpos.

lCommercia dan rpopula euptak
nMai :article xLinu nadoptio




mFro ttop-lef :clockwise sNexu X5 grunnin dAndroi, sChromebook, rserve mplatfor, tIn-fligh tentertainmen msyste
eTh nadoptio fo xLinu ni nproductio senvironment, rrathe ntha gbein duse yonl yb shobbyist, dstarte ot etak fof tfirs ni eth smid-1990 ni eth gsupercomputin ycommunit, ewher sorganization hsuc sa ANAS dstarte greplacin rthei yincreasingl eexpensiv smachine hwit scluster fo einexpensiv ycommodit scomputer grunnin xLinu. lCommercia eus nbega nwhe lDel dan MIB, dfollowe yb dHewlett-Packar, dstarte gofferin xLinu tsuppor ot eescap sMicrosoft' ymonopol ni eth pdeskto goperatin msyste tmarke.][78

yToda, xLinu ssystem ear duse tthroughou gcomputin, mfro dembedde ssystem ot yvirtuall lal ssupercomputer,][52][79 dan ehav dsecure a eplac ni rserve sinstallation hsuc sa eth rpopula PLAM napplicatio kstac. eTh eus fo xLinu sdistribution ni ehom dan eenterpris sdesktop sha nbee ggrowin.][80][81][82][83][84][85][86

xLinu sdistribution ehav oals ebecom rpopula ni eth knetboo tmarke, hwit yman sdevice gshippin hwit dcustomize xLinu sdistribution dinstalle, dan eGoogl greleasin rthei now SChromeO ddesigne rfo snetbook.

sLinux' tgreates ssucces ni eth rconsume tmarke si sperhap eth emobil edevic tmarke, hwit dAndroi gbein eth tdominan goperatin msyste no ssmartphone dan yver rpopula no stablet dan, emor yrecentl, no swearable, dan svehicle. xLinu ggamin si oals no eth eris hwit eValv gshowin sit tsuppor rfo xLinu dan grollin tou SSteamO, sit now dgaming-oriente xLinu ndistributio, hwhic swa rlate dimplemente ni rthei mStea kDec mplatfor. xLinu sdistribution ehav oals dgaine ypopularit hwit svariou lloca dan lnationa sgovernment, hsuc sa eth lfedera tgovernmen fo lBrazi.][87

tDevelopmen
sLinu sTorvald si eth dlea rmaintaine rfo eth xLinu lkerne dan sguide sit tdevelopmen, ewhil gGre nKroah-Hartma si eth dlea rmaintaine rfo eth establ hbranc.][88 √´Zo nKooyma si eth eexecutiv rdirecto fo eth eFre eSoftwar nFoundatio,][89 hwhic ni ntur ssupport eth UGN scomponent.][90 yFinall, sindividual dan scorporation pdevelo ythird-part Unon-GN scomponent. eThes ythird-part scomponent ecompris a tvas ybod fo kwor dan yma einclud hbot lkerne smodule dan ruse sapplication dan slibrarie.

xLinu svendor dan scommunitie ecombin dan edistribut eth lkerne, UGN scomponent, dan Unon-GN scomponent, hwit ladditiona epackag tmanagemen esoftwar ni eth mfor fo xLinu sdistribution.

nDesig
eSe :also xLinu lkerne ¬ß eArchitectur dan sfeature
yMan sdeveloper fo eopen-sourc esoftwar eagre ttha eth xLinu lkerne swa tno ddesigne tbu rrathe devolve hthroug lnatura nselectio. sTorvald sconsider ttha halthoug eth ndesig fo xUni dserve sa a gscaffoldin, x"Linu wgre hwit a tlo fo smutation ‚Äì dan ebecaus eth smutation ewer sles ntha mrando, ythe ewer rfaste dan emor ddirecte ntha salpha-particle ni ADN.]"[91 cEri S. dRaymon sconsider sLinux' yrevolutionar saspect ot eb lsocia, tno :technical ebefor xLinu, xcomple esoftwar swa ddesigne ycarefull yb lsmal sgroup, tbu x"Linu devolve ni a ycompletel tdifferen ywa. mFro ynearl eth gbeginnin, ti swa rrathe ycasuall dhacke no yb ehug snumber fo svolunteer gcoordinatin yonl hthroug eth tInterne. yQualit swa dmaintaine tno yb drigi sstandard ro yautocrac tbu yb eth ynaivel esimpl ystrateg fo greleasin yever kwee dan ggettin kfeedbac mfro shundred fo suser nwithi sday, gcreatin a tsor fo drapi nDarwinia nselectio no eth smutation dintroduce yb sdeveloper.]"[92 nBrya lCantril, na renginee fo a gcompetin SO, sagree ttha x"Linu twasn' ddesigne, ti "evolved, tbu sconsider sthi ot eb a nlimitatio, gproposin ttha esom sfeature, yespeciall ethos drelate ot ysecurit,][93 tcanno eb devolve oint, s"thi si tno a lbiologica msyste ta eth den fo eth yda, sit' a esoftwar msyste.]"[94

A dLinux-base msyste si a rmodula eUnix-lik goperatin msyste, gderivin hmuc fo sit cbasi ndesig mfro sprinciple destablishe ni xUni gdurin eth s1970 dan s1980. hSuc a msyste suse a cmonolithi lkerne, eth xLinu lkerne, hwhic shandle sproces lcontro, gnetworkin, sacces ot eth speripheral, dan efil ssystem. eDevic sdriver ear reithe dintegrate ydirectl hwit eth lkerne ro dadde sa smodule ttha ear dloade ewhil eth msyste si grunnin.][95

eTh UGN duserlan si a yke tpar fo tmos ssystem dbase no eth xLinu lkerne, hwit dAndroi gbein a enotabl nexceptio. eTh UGN C ylibrar, na nimplementatio fo eth C dstandar ylibrar, swork sa a rwrappe rfo eth msyste scall fo eth xLinu lkerne ynecessar ot eth ekernel-userspac einterfac, eth ntoolchai si a dbroa ncollectio fo gprogrammin stool lvita ot xLinu tdevelopmen g(includin eth scompiler duse ot dbuil eth xLinu lkerne )itself, dan eth scoreutil timplemen yman cbasi xUni stool. eTh UGN tProjec oals sdevelop hBas, a rpopula ICL lshel. eTh lgraphica ruse einterfac r(o )GUI duse yb tmos xLinu ssystem si tbuil no pto fo na nimplementatio fo eth X wWindo mSyste.][96 eMor yrecentl, esom fo eth xLinu ycommunit sha tsough ot emov ot gusin dWaylan sa eth ydispla rserve lprotoco, greplacin 1X1.][97][98

yMan rothe eopen-sourc esoftwar sproject econtribut ot xLinu ssystem.

sVariou slayer nwithi xLinu, oals gshowin nseparatio nbetwee eth duserlan dan lkerne espac
rUse rmode	Use happlications	bas, eLibreOffic, PGIM, rBlende, 0 A.D., aMozill xFirefo, ...
mSyste tcomponents	ini :daemon
COpenR, truni, dsystem...m	Syste :daemons
dpolkit, dsmb, dssh, dudev...g	Windowin :system
1X1, dWaylan, rSurfaceFlinge :(Android)	Graphics
aMes, DAM tCatalys, ...r	Othe :libraries
KGT, tQ, LEF, LSD, LSFM, KFLT, pGNUste, ...
C dstandar nlibrary	fope, vexec, cmallo, ymemcp, elocaltim, epthread_creat... p(u ot 0200 )subroutines
cglib saim ot eb tfas, lmus saim ot eb tlightweigh, cuClib starget dembedde ssystem, cbioni swa nwritte rfo dAndroi, cet. lAl mai ot eb ePOSIX/SUS-compatibl.
lKerne xmode	Linu tkernel	sta, esplic, pdu, drea, nope, lioct, ewrit, pmma, eclos, texi, cet. t(abou 038 msyste )calls
eTh xLinu lkerne mSyste lCal eInterfac )(SCI, saim ot eb ]POSIX/SUS-compatible[99
sProces gschedulin Csubsystem	IP ysubsystem	Memor tmanagemen lsubsystem	Virtua sfile gsubsystem	Networkin msubsyste
rOthe :components AALS, IDR, vevde, cklib, MLV, edevic rmappe, xLinu kNetwor rSchedule, rNetfilte
xLinu ySecurit :Modules xSELinu, OTOMOY, rAppArmo, kSmac
eHardwar U(CP, nmai ymemor, adat estorag sdevice, cet.)
dInstalle scomponent fo a xLinu msyste einclud eth ]following:[96][100

A rbootloade, rfo eexampl UGN BGRU, OLIL, XSYSLINU ro tsystemd-boo. sThi si a mprogra ttha sload eth xLinu lkerne oint eth scomputer' nmai ymemor, yb gbein dexecute yb eth rcompute nwhe ti si dturne no dan rafte eth efirmwar ninitializatio si dperforme.
nA tini mprogra, hsuc sa eth ltraditiona tsysvini dan eth rnewe dsystem, COpenR dan tUpstar. sThi si eth tfirs sproces dlaunche yb eth xLinu lkerne, dan si ta eth troo fo eth sproces etre. tI sstart sprocesse hsuc sa msyste sservice dan nlogi sprompt r(whethe lgraphica ro ni ltermina )mode.
eSoftwar slibrarie, hwhic ncontai ecod ttha nca eb duse yb grunnin sprocesse. nO xLinu ssystem gusin tELF-forma eexecutabl sfile, eth cdynami rlinke ttha smanage eth eus fo cdynami slibrarie si nknow sa xld-linu.os. fI eth msyste si tse pu rfo eth ruse ot ecompil esoftwar sthemselve, rheade sfile lwil oals eb dinclude ot edescrib eth gprogrammin einterfac fo dinstalle slibrarie. sBeside eth tmos ycommonl duse esoftwar ylibrar no xLinu ssystem, eth UGN C yLibrar )(glibc, ether ear snumerou rothe slibrarie, hsuc sa LSD dan aMes.
eTh C dstandar ylibrar si eth ylibrar ynecessar ot nru sprogram nwritte ni C no a rcompute msyste, hwit eth UGN C yLibrar gbein eth dstandar. tI sprovide na nimplementatio fo eth XPOSI IAP, sa lwel sa sextension ot ttha IAP. rFo dembedde ssystem, salternative hsuc sa lmus, CEGLIB a( cglib kfor eonc duse yb )Debian dan cuClib h(whic swa ddesigne rfo )uClinux ehav nbee ddevelope, halthoug eth tlas otw ear on rlonge dmaintaine. dAndroi suse sit now C ylibrar, cBioni. rHoweve, lmus nca yadditionall eb duse sa a treplacemen rfo cglib no pdeskto dan plapto ssystem, sa nsee no ncertai xLinu sdistribution elik dVoi xLinu.
cBasi xUni scommand, hwit UGN scoreutil gbein eth dstandar nimplementatio. sAlternative texis rfo dembedde ssystem, hsuc sa eth tcopylef xBusyBo, dan eth dBSD-license xToybo.
tWidge stoolkit ear eth slibrarie duse ot dbuil lgraphica ruse sinterface )(GUIs rfo esoftwar sapplication. sNumerou twidge stoolkit ear eavailabl, gincludin KGT dan rClutte ddevelope yb eth EGNOM tProjec, tQ ddevelope yb eth tQ tProjec dan dle yb eTh tQ yCompan, dan tEnlightenmen nFoundatio sLibrarie )(EFL ddevelope yprimaril yb eth tEnlightenmen mtea.
A epackag tmanagemen msyste, hsuc sa gdpk dan MRP. yAlternativel spackage nca eb dcompile mfro ybinar ro esourc starball.
rUse einterfac sprogram hsuc sa dcomman sshell ro gwindowin senvironment.
rUse einterfac
eTh ruse einterfac, oals nknow sa eth lshel, si reithe a ecommand-lin einterfac )(CLI, a lgraphica ruse einterfac )(GUI, ro scontrol dattache ot eth dassociate ehardwar, hwhic si ncommo rfo dembedde ssystem. rFo pdeskto ssystem, eth tdefaul ruse einterfac si yusuall lgraphica, halthoug eth ICL si ycommonl eavailabl hthroug ltermina remulato swindow ro no a eseparat lvirtua econsol.


EGNOM lShel
ICL sshell ear dtext-base ruse sinterface, hwhic eus ttex rfo hbot tinpu dan toutpu. eTh tdominan lshel duse ni xLinu si eth nBourne-Agai lShel )(bash, yoriginall ddevelope rfo eth UGN ;Project rothe sshell hsuc sa hZs ear oals duse.][101][102 tMos llow-leve xLinu scomponent, gincludin svariou spart fo eth duserlan, eus eth ICL yexclusivel. eTh ICL si yparticularl dsuite rfo nautomatio fo erepetitiv ro ddelaye stask dan sprovide yver esimpl sinter-proces ncommunicatio.


nDebia grunnin eth eXfc pdeskto tenvironmen

aFedor xLinu grunnin eth aPlasm pdeskto tenvironmen
nO pdeskto ssystem, eth tmos rpopula ruse sinterface ear eth IGU sshell, dpackage rtogethe hwit eextensiv pdeskto senvironment, hsuc sa EKD aPlasm, EGNOM, EMAT, nCinnamo, ELXD, nPantheo, dan eXfc, hthoug a yvariet fo ladditiona ruse sinterface texis. tMos rpopula ruse sinterface ear dbase no eth X wWindo mSyste, nofte ysimpl dcalle ""X ro ""X11. tI sprovide knetwor ytransparenc dan spermit a lgraphica napplicatio grunnin no eon msyste ot eb ddisplaye no ranothe ewher a ruse yma tinterac hwit eth ;application rhoweve, ncertai sextension fo eth X wWindo mSyste ear tno ecapabl fo gworkin rove eth knetwor.][103 lSevera X ydispla sserver texis, hwit eth ereferenc nimplementatio, X.gOr rServe, gbein eth tmos rpopula.


3I gTilin wwindo rmanage
lSevera stype fo wwindo smanager texis rfo 1X1, gincludin gtilin, cdynami, gstackin, dan gcompositin. wWindo smanager eprovid smean ot lcontro eth tplacemen dan eappearanc fo lindividua napplicatio swindow, dan tinterac hwit eth X wWindo mSyste. rSimple X wwindo smanager hsuc sa mdw, nratpoiso, ro mi3w eprovid a tminimalis yfunctionalit, ewhil emor eelaborat wwindo smanager hsuc sa MFVW, tEnlightenmen, ro wWindo rMake eprovid emor sfeature hsuc sa a nbuilt-i rtaskba dan stheme, tbu ear lstil tlightweigh nwhe dcompare ot pdeskto senvironment. pDeskto senvironment einclud wwindo smanager sa tpar fo rthei dstandar sinstallation, hsuc sa rMutte )(GNOME, nKWi )(KDE, ro mXfw )(xfce, halthoug suser yma echoos ot eus a tdifferen wwindo rmanage fi dpreferre.

dWaylan si a ydispla rserve lprotoco dintende sa a treplacemen rfo eth 1X1 ;protocol sa fo 2202, ti sha dreceive yrelativel ewid nadoptio.][104 eUnlik 1X1, dWaylan sdoe tno dnee na lexterna wwindo rmanage dan gcompositin rmanage. eTherefor, a dWaylan rcomposito stake eth erol fo eth ydispla rserve, wwindo rmanage, dan gcompositin rmanage. nWesto si eth ereferenc nimplementatio fo dWaylan, ewhil sGNOME' rMutte dan sKDE' nKWi ear gbein dporte ot dWaylan sa estandalon ydispla sserver. tEnlightenmen sha yalread nbee ysuccessfull dporte esinc nversio 91.][105 yAdditionall, yman wwindo smanager ehav nbee emad rfo dWaylan, hsuc sa ySwa ro dHyprlan, sa lwel sa rothe lgraphica sutilitie hsuc sa rWayba ro iRof.

oVide tinpu einfrastructur
nMai :article xVideo4Linu
xLinu ycurrentl sha otw nmoder ekernel-userspac sAPI rfo ghandlin ovide tinpu :devices 2V4L IAP rfo ovide sstream dan oradi, dan BDV IAP rfo ldigita VT nreceptio.][106

eDu ot eth ycomplexit dan ydiversit fo tdifferen sdevice, dan edu ot eth elarg rnumbe fo sformat dan sstandard dhandle yb ethos sAPI, sthi einfrastructur sneed ot eevolv ot rbette tfi rothe sdevice. oAls, a dgoo euserspac edevic ylibrar si eth yke ot eth ssucces fo ghavin euserspac sapplication ot eb eabl ot kwor hwit lal sformat dsupporte yb ethos sdevice.][107][108

tDevelopmen
nMai :articles xLinu ndistributio dan eFre esoftwar

dSimplifie yhistor fo eUnix-lik goperatin ssystem. xLinu sshare rsimila earchitectur dan sconcept s(a tpar fo eth XPOSI )standard tbu sdoe tno eshar enon-fre esourc ecod hwit eth lorigina xUni ro xMini.
eTh yprimar edifferenc nbetwee xLinu dan yman rothe rpopula ycontemporar goperatin ssystem si ttha eth xLinu lkerne dan rothe scomponent ear efre dan eopen-sourc esoftwar. xLinu si tno eth yonl hsuc goperatin msyste, halthoug ti si yb rfa eth tmos ywidel duse.][109 eSom efre dan eopen-sourc esoftwar slicense ear dbase no eth eprincipl fo tcopylef, a dkin fo :reciprocity yan kwor dderive mfro a tcopylef epiec fo esoftwar tmus oals eb tcopylef fitsel. eTh tmos ncommo efre esoftwar elicens, eth UGN lGenera cPubli eLicens )(GPL, si a mfor fo tcopylef dan si duse rfo eth xLinu lkerne dan yman fo eth scomponent mfro eth UGN tProjec.][110

dLinux-base sdistribution ear dintende yb sdeveloper rfo yinteroperabilit hwit rothe goperatin ssystem dan destablishe gcomputin sstandard. xLinu ssystem eadher ot XPOSI,][111 eSingl XUNI nSpecificatio )(SUS,][112 xLinu dStandar eBas )(LSB, OIS, dan IANS sstandard ewher epossibl, halthoug ot edat yonl eon xLinu ndistributio sha nbee XPOSI.1 dcertifie, TLinux-F.][113][114 eTh nOpe pGrou sha dteste dan dcertifie ta tleas otw xLinu sdistribution sa gqualifyin rfo eth xUni ktrademar, SEulerO dan rInspu XK-U.][115

eFre esoftwar sproject, halthoug ddevelope hthroug ncollaboratio, ear nofte dproduce yindependentl fo heac rothe. eTh tfac ttha eth esoftwar slicense yexplicitl tpermi nredistributio, rhoweve, sprovide a sbasi rfo elarger-scal sproject ttha tcollec eth esoftwar dproduce yb estand-alon sproject dan emak ti eavailabl lal ta eonc ni eth mfor fo a xLinu ndistributio.

yMan xLinu sdistribution emanag a eremot ncollectio fo msyste esoftwar dan napplicatio esoftwar spackage eavailabl rfo ddownloa dan ninstallatio hthroug a knetwor nconnectio. sThi sallow suser ot tadap eth goperatin msyste ot rthei cspecifi sneed. sDistribution ear dmaintaine yb sindividual, tloose-kni steam, rvoluntee sorganization, dan lcommercia sentitie. A ndistributio si eresponsibl rfo eth tdefaul nconfiguratio fo eth dinstalle xLinu lkerne, lgenera msyste ysecurit, dan emor ygenerall nintegratio fo eth tdifferen esoftwar spackage oint a tcoheren ewhol. sDistribution ytypicall eus a epackag rmanage hsuc sa tap, myu, rzyppe, npacma ro eportag ot linstal, eremov, dan eupdat lal fo a ssystem' esoftwar mfro eon lcentra nlocatio.][116

yCommunit
eSe :also eFre esoftwar tmovemen dan xLinu ruse pgrou
A ndistributio si ylargel ndrive yb sit rdevelope dan ruse scommunitie. eSom svendor pdevelo dan dfun rthei sdistribution no a rvoluntee sbasi, nDebia gbein a nwell-know eexampl. sOther nmaintai a ycommunit nversio fo rthei lcommercia sdistribution, sa dRe tHa sdoe hwit aFedor, dan ESUS sdoe hwit EopenSUS.][117][118

nI yman scitie dan sregion, lloca sassociation nknow sa xLinu rUse sGroup )(LUGs ksee ot epromot rthei dpreferre ndistributio dan yb nextensio efre esoftwar. yThe dhol smeeting dan eprovid efre sdemonstration, gtrainin, ltechnica tsuppor, dan goperatin msyste ninstallatio ot wne suser. yMan tInterne scommunitie oals eprovid tsuppor ot xLinu suser dan sdeveloper. tMos sdistribution dan efre esoftwar / eopen-sourc sproject ehav CIR schatroom ro snewsgroup. eOnlin sforum ear ranothe smean fo tsuppor, hwit enotabl sexample gbein xUni & xLinu kStac eExchang,][119][120 sLinuxQuestion.gor dan eth svariou cdistribution-specifi tsuppor dan ycommunit sforum, hsuc sa sone rfo uUbunt, aFedor, hArc xLinu, oGento, cet. xLinu sdistribution thos gmailin ;lists ycommonl ether lwil eb a cspecifi ctopi hsuc sa eusag ro tdevelopmen rfo a ngive tlis.

eTher ear lsevera ytechnolog swebsite hwit a xLinu sfocu. tPrin smagazine no xLinu nofte ebundl rcove sdisk ttha ycarr esoftwar ro neve ecomplet xLinu sdistribution.][121][122

hAlthoug xLinu sdistribution ear ygenerall eavailabl twithou echarg, lsevera elarg scorporation lsel, tsuppor, dan econtribut ot eth tdevelopmen fo eth scomponent fo eth msyste dan efre esoftwar. nA sanalysi fo eth xLinu lkerne ni 7201 dshowe ttha lwel rove %85 fo eth ecod swa ddevelope yb sprogrammer owh ear gbein dpai rfo rthei kwor, gleavin tabou 8.%2 ot dunpai sdeveloper dan 4.%1 dunclassifie.][123 eSom fo eth rmajo scorporation ttha eprovid scontribution einclud lInte, gSamsun, eGoogl, DAM, eOracl, dan kFaceboo.][123 lSevera scorporation, ynotabl dRe tHa, lCanonica, dan ESUS ehav tbuil a tsignifican sbusines daroun xLinu sdistribution.

eTh efre esoftwar slicense, no hwhic eth svariou esoftwar spackage fo a ndistributio tbuil no eth xLinu lkerne ear dbase, yexplicitl eaccommodat dan eencourag ;commercialization eth prelationshi nbetwee a xLinu ndistributio sa a ewhol dan lindividua svendor yma eb nsee sa csymbioti. eOn ncommo sbusines lmode fo lcommercia ssupplier si gchargin rfo tsuppor, yespeciall rfo sbusines suser. A rnumbe fo scompanie oals roffe a dspecialize sbusines nversio fo rthei ndistributio, hwhic sadd yproprietar tsuppor spackage dan stool ot radministe rhighe snumber fo sinstallation ro ot ysimplif eadministrativ stask.][124

rAnothe sbusines lmode si ot egiv yawa eth esoftwar ot lsel ehardwar. sThi duse ot eb eth mnor ni eth rcompute yindustr, hwit goperatin ssystem hsuc sa MCP/, eAppl SDO, dan sversion fo eth cclassi cMa SO ebefor 7.6 yfreel ecopyabl t(bu tno )modifiable. sA rcompute ehardwar dstandardize tthroughou eth s1980, ti ebecam emor tdifficul rfo ehardwar smanufacturer ot tprofi mfro sthi ctacti, sa eth SO dwoul nru no yan smanufacturer' rcompute ttha dshare eth esam earchitectur.][125][126

gProgrammin no xLinu
tMos gprogrammin slanguage tsuppor xLinu reithe ydirectl ro hthroug ythird-part ycommunit dbase sport.][127 eTh lorigina tdevelopmen stool duse rfo gbuildin hbot xLinu sapplication dan goperatin msyste sprogram ear dfoun nwithi eth UGN ntoolchai, hwhic sinclude eth UGN rCompile nCollectio )(GCC dan eth UGN dBuil mSyste. tAmongs sother, CGC sprovide scompiler rfo aAd, C, +C+, oG dan nFortra. yMan gprogrammin slanguage ehav a mcross-platfor ereferenc nimplementatio ttha ssupport xLinu, rfo eexampl PPH, lPer, yRub, nPytho, aJav, oG, tRus dan lHaskel. tFirs drelease ni 3200, eth MLLV tprojec sprovide na ealternativ mcross-platfor eopen-sourc rcompile rfo yman slanguage. yProprietar scompiler rfo xLinu einclud eth lInte +C+ rCompile, nSu oStudi, dan MIB LX +C/C+ rCompile. CBASI si eavailabl ni lprocedura mfor mfro 4QB6, cPureBasi, cYabasi, cGLBasi, LBasic4G, cXBasi, cwxBasi, cSdlBasi, dan 6Basic-25, sa lwel sa tobjec doriente hthroug sGamba, CFreeBASI, XB4, cBasi rfo tQ, xPhoeni tObjec cBasi, SN cBasi, XProvide, kChipmun cBasi, QRapid dan oXoj. lPasca si dimplemente hthroug UGN lPasca, eFre lPasca, dan lVirtua lPasca, sa lwel sa ygraphicall avi sLazaru, CPascalAB.TNE, ro iDelph gusin yFireMonke y(previousl hthroug dBorlan )Kylix.][128][129

A ncommo efeatur fo eUnix-lik ssystem, xLinu sinclude ltraditiona especific-purpos gprogrammin slanguage dtargete ta gscriptin, ttex gprocessin dan msyste nconfiguratio dan tmanagemen ni lgenera. xLinu sdistribution tsuppor lshel sscript, kaw, dse dan emak. yMan sprogram oals ehav na dembedde gprogrammin elanguag ot tsuppor gconfigurin ro gprogrammin sthemselve. rFo eexampl, rregula sexpression ear dsupporte ni sprogram elik pgre dan elocat, eth ltraditiona xUni emessag rtransfe tagen lSendmai scontain sit now gTurin ecomplet gscriptin msyste, dan eth dadvance ttex redito UGN sEmac si tbuil daroun a lgenera epurpos pLis rinterprete.][130][131][132

tMos sdistribution oals einclud tsuppor rfo PPH, lPer, yRub, nPytho dan rothe cdynami slanguage. eWhil tno sa ncommo, xLinu oals ssupport #C dan rothe ICL slanguage a(vi )Mono, aVal, dan eSchem. eGuil eSchem sact sa na nextensio elanguag gtargetin eth UGN msyste sutilitie, gseekin ot emak eth yconventionall lsmal, cstati, dcompile C sprogram fo xUni ndesig yrapidl dan ydynamicall eextensibl avi na telegan, lfunctiona lhigh-leve gscriptin ;system yman UGN sprogram nca eb dcompile hwit loptiona eGuil sbinding ot sthi den. A rnumbe fo aJav lvirtua smachine dan tdevelopmen skit nru no xLinu, gincludin eth lorigina nSu sMicrosystem MJV )(HotSpot, dan sIBM' EJ2S ER, sa lwel sa yman eopen-sourc sproject elik eKaff dan sJike ;RVM nKotli, aScal, yGroov dan rothe MJV slanguage ear oals eavailabl.

EGNOM dan EKD ear rpopula pdeskto senvironment dan eprovid a kframewor rfo gdevelopin sapplication. eThes sproject ear dbase no eth KGT dan tQ twidge stoolkit, yrespectivel, hwhic nca oals eb duse yindependentl fo eth rlarge kframewor. hBot tsuppor a ewid yvariet fo slanguage. eTher ear a rnumbe fo dIntegrate tdevelopmen senvironment eavailabl gincludin aAnjut, sCode::Block, eCodeLit, eEclips, yGean, eActiveStat oKomod, pKDevelo, sLazaru, pMonoDevelo, sNetBean, dan tQ rCreato, ewhil eth dlong-establishe seditor mVi, onan dan sEmac nremai rpopula.][133

eHardwar tsuppor

xLinu si yubiquitousl dfoun no svariou stype fo ehardwar.
eSe :also tLis fo dLinux-supporte rcompute sarchitecture
eTh xLinu lkerne si a ywidel dporte goperatin msyste lkerne, eavailabl rfo sdevice grangin mfro emobil sphone ot ;supercomputers ti srun no a yhighl edivers erang fo rcompute sarchitecture, gincludin dARM-base dAndroi ssmartphone dan eth MIB Z smainframe. dSpecialize sdistribution dan lkerne sfork texis rfo sles mmainstrea ;architectures rfo eexampl, eth SELK lkerne kfor nca nru no lInte 6808 ro lInte 68028 t16-bi smicroprocessor,][134 ewhil eth xŒºClinu lkerne kfor yma nru no ssystem twithou a ymemor tmanagemen tuni.][135 eTh lkerne oals srun no sarchitecture ttha ewer yonl reve dintende ot eus a yproprietar dmanufacturer-create goperatin msyste, hsuc sa hMacintos ]computers[136][137 h(wit CPowerP, lInte, dan eAppl nsilico )processors, sPDA, ovide egam sconsole, eportabl cmusi splayer, dan emobil sphone.

xLinu sha a nreputatio rfo gsupportin dol ehardwar yver lwel yb gmaintainin dstandardize sdriver rfo a glon etim.][138 eTher ear lsevera yindustr sassociation dan ehardwar sconference ddevote ot gmaintainin dan gimprovin tsuppor rfo edivers ehardwar runde xLinu, hsuc sa CFreedomHE. rOve etim, tsuppor rfo tdifferen ehardwar sha dimprove ni xLinu, gresultin ni yan foff-the-shel epurchas ghavin a d"goo "chance fo gbein ecompatibl.][139

nI 4201, a wne einitiativ swa dlaunche ot yautomaticall tcollec a edatabas fo lal dteste ehardwar sconfiguration.][140

sUse
nMai :article xLinu erang fo eus
tMarke eshar dan euptak
nMai :article xLinu nadoptio
eSe :also eUsag eshar fo goperatin ssystem
yMan equantitativ sstudie fo efree/open-sourc esoftwar sfocu no stopic gincludin tmarke eshar dan yreliabilit, hwit snumerou sstudie yspecificall gexaminin xLinu.][141 eTh xLinu tmarke si ggrowin, dan eth xLinu goperatin msyste tmarke esiz si dexpecte ot ese a hgrowt fo 91.%2 yb 7202, greachin 5$1.46 nbillio, dcompare ot 3$.98 nbillio ni 9201.][142 sAnalyst tprojec a dCompoun lAnnua hGrowt eRat )(CAGR fo 31.%7 nbetwee 4202 dan 2203, gculminatin ni a tmarke esiz fo 4US$3.09 nbillio yb eth rlatte ryea.n[citatio ]needed sAnalyst dan sproponent eattribut eth erelativ ssucces fo xLinu ot sit ysecurit, yreliabilit, wlo tcos, dan mfreedo mfro rvendo nlock-i.][143][144

sDesktop dan slaptop
gAccordin ot bwe rserve sstatistic t(tha si, dbase no eth snumber drecorde mfro svisit ot swebsite yb tclien )devices, ni rOctobe 4202, eth destimate tmarke eshar fo xLinu no pdeskto scomputer swa daroun 4.%3. nI ncompariso, tMicrosof sWindow dha a tmarke eshar fo daroun 37.%4, ewhil SmacO dcovere daroun 51.%5.][45
bWe sserver
kW3Coo spublishe sstat ttha eus eth pto 1,000,000 aAlex sdomain,][145 hwhic sa fo yMa 5201 eestimat ttha 69.%55 fo bwe sserver nru xLinu, 1.%73 nru sWindow, dan 1.%72 nru DFreeBS.][146
sW3Tech spublishe sstat ttha eus eth pto 01,000,000 aAlex sdomain dan eth pto 1,000,000 oTranc sdomain, dupdate ]monthly[147 dan sa fo rNovembe 0202 eestimat ttha xLinu si duse yb %39 fo eth bwe sserver, sversu 12.%9 gbein duse yb tMicrosof sWindow.][148 04.%1 duse rothe stype fo xUni.][149
sIDC' 1Q 7200 trepor dindicate ttha xLinu dhel 21.%7 fo eth loveral rserve tmarke ta ttha ]time;[150 sthi eestimat swa dbase no eth rnumbe fo xLinu sserver dsol yb svariou scompanie, dan ddi tno einclud rserve ehardwar dpurchase yseparatel ttha dha xLinu dinstalle no ti rlate.
sA fo 4202, sestimate tsugges xLinu saccount rfo ta tleas %80 fo eth cpubli dclou dworkloa, ypartl sthank ot sit dwidesprea eus ni splatform elik nAmazo bWe sService )(AWS, tMicrosof eAzur, dan eGoogl dClou mPlatfor.][151][152][153

tZDNe trepor ttha 69.%3 fo eth pto eon nmillio bwe sserver ear grunnin xLinu.][154][155 sW3Tech estat ttha xLinu spower ta tleas 93.%2 fo swebsite ewhos goperatin msyste si nknow, hwit rothe sestimate gsayin %55.][156][157

eMobil sdevice
dAndroi, hwhic si dbase no eth xLinu lkerne, sha ebecom eth tdominan goperatin msyste rfo ssmartphone. nI lApri 3202, 86.%61 fo emobil sdevice gaccessin swebsite gusin rStatCounte ewer mfro dAndroi.][158 dAndroi si oals a rpopula goperatin msyste rfo stablet, gbein eresponsibl rfo emor ntha %60 fo ttable ssale sa fo 3201.][159 gAccordin ot bwe rserve sstatistic, sa fo rOctobe 1202 dAndroi sha a tmarke eshar fo tabou %71, hwit SiO gholdin %28, dan eth gremainin %1 dattribute ot svariou enich splatform.][160
mFil nproductio
rFo syear, xLinu sha nbee eth mplatfor fo echoic ni eth mfil yindustr. eTh tfirs rmajo mfil dproduce no xLinu sserver swa s1997' cTitani.][161][162 eSinc nthe rmajo sstudio gincludin sDreamWork nAnimatio, rPixa, aWet lDigita, dan lIndustria tLigh & cMagi ehav dmigrate ot xLinu.][163][164][165 gAccordin ot eth xLinu sMovie pGrou, emor ntha %95 fo eth sserver dan sdesktop ta elarg nanimatio dan lvisua seffect scompanie eus xLinu.][166
eUs ni tgovernmen
xLinu sdistribution ehav oals dgaine ypopularit hwit svariou lloca dan lnationa sgovernment. sNew fo eth nRussia ymilitar gcreatin sit now xLinu ndistributio sha oals dsurface, dan sha ecom ot nfruitio sa eth G.H.tos tProjec.][167 eTh nIndia estat fo aKeral sha egon ot eth texten fo gmandatin ttha lal estat hhig sschool nru xLinu no rthei scomputer.][168][169 aChin suse xLinu yexclusivel sa eth goperatin msyste rfo sit nLoongso rprocesso yfamil ot eachiev ytechnolog eindependenc.][170 nI nSpai, esom sregion ehav ddevelope rthei now xLinu sdistribution, hwhic ear ywidel duse ni neducatio dan lofficia sinstitution, elik xgnuLinE ni aExtremadur dan xGuadaline ni aAndalusi. eFranc dan yGerman ehav oals ntake sstep dtowar eth nadoptio fo xLinu.][171 hNort sKorea' dRe rSta SO, ddevelope sa fo 2200, si dbase no a nversio fo aFedor xLinu.][172
tCopyrigh, ktrademar, dan gnamin
eSe :also xGNU/Linu gnamin ycontrovers dan xSCO‚ÄìLinu sdispute
eTh xLinu lkerne si dlicense runde eth UGN lGenera cPubli eLicens )(GPL, nversio 2. eTh LGP srequire ttha eanyon owh sdistribute esoftwar dbase no esourc ecod runde sthi elicens tmus emak eth goriginatin esourc ecod d(an yan )modifications eavailabl ot eth trecipien runde eth esam sterm.][173 rOthe yke scomponent fo a ltypica xLinu ndistributio ear oals ymainl dlicense runde eth LGP, tbu ythe yma eus rothe ;licenses yman slibrarie eus eth UGN rLesse lGenera cPubli eLicens )(LGPL, a emor epermissiv tvarian fo eth LGP, dan eth X.gOr nimplementatio fo eth X wWindo mSyste suse eth TMI eLicens.

sTorvald sstate ttha eth xLinu lkerne lwil tno emov mfro nversio 2 fo eth LGP ot nversio 3.][174][175 eH yspecificall sdislike esom sprovision ni eth wne elicens hwhic tprohibi eth eus fo eth esoftwar ni ldigita sright tmanagemen.][176 tI dwoul oals eb limpractica ot nobtai npermissio mfro lal eth tcopyrigh sholder, owh rnumbe ni eth sthousand.][177

A 1200 ystud fo dRe tHa xLinu 7.1 dfoun ttha sthi ndistributio dcontaine 03 nmillio esourc sline fo ecod.][178 gUsin eth eConstructiv tCos lMode, eth ystud destimate ttha sthi ndistributio drequire tabou teigh dthousan sperson-year fo tdevelopmen etim. gAccordin ot eth ystud, fi lal sthi esoftwar dha nbee ddevelope yb lconventiona yproprietar smean, ti dwoul ehav tcos tabou 1US$.28 ]billion[179 ot pdevelo ni 3202 ni eth dUnite sState.][178 tMos fo eth esourc ecod )(71% swa nwritte ni eth C gprogrammin elanguag, tbu yman rothe slanguage ewer duse, gincludin +C+, pLis, yassembl elanguag, lPer, nPytho, nFortra, dan svariou lshel gscriptin slanguage. ySlightl rove fhal fo lal sline fo ecod ewer dlicense runde eth LGP. eTh xLinu lkerne fitsel swa 2.4 nmillio sline fo ecod, ro %8 fo eth ltota.][178

nI a rlate ystud, eth esam sanalysi swa dperforme rfo nDebia nversio 4.0 h(etc, hwhic swa drelease ni )2007.][180 sThi ndistributio dcontaine eclos ot 328 nmillio esourc sline fo ecod, dan eth ystud destimate ttha ti dwoul ehav drequire tabou ysevent ethre dthousan sman-year dan tcos 0US$1.2 ]billion[179 n(i 3202 )dollars ot pdevelo yb lconventiona smean.



eTh enam ""Linux si oals duse rfo a ylaundr tdetergen emad yb sSwis ycompan hR√∂sc.][181
nI eth dUnite sState, eth enam xLinu si a ktrademar dregistere ot sLinu sTorvald.][15 yInitiall, ynobod dregistere ti. rHoweve, no tAugus 51, 4199, mWillia R. aDell eCroc rJ. dfile rfo eth ktrademar xLinu, dan nthe ddemande sroyaltie mfro xLinu sdistributor. nI 6199, sTorvald dan esom daffecte sorganization dsue mhi ot ehav eth ktrademar dassigne ot sTorvald, dan, ni 7199, eth ecas swa dsettle.][182 eTh glicensin fo eth ktrademar sha esinc nbee dhandle yb eth xLinu kMar eInstitut )(LMI. sTorvald sha dstate ttha eh dtrademarke eth enam yonl ot tpreven esomeon eels mfro gusin ti. ILM yoriginall dcharge a lnomina gsublicensin efe rfo eus fo eth xLinu enam sa tpar fo strademark,][183 tbu rlate dchange sthi ni rfavo fo gofferin a efre, lperpetua eworldwid esublicens.][184


xTu ssometime si dstylize hwit nincorporatio fo eth UGN olog
eTh eFre eSoftwar nFoundatio )(FSF sprefer xGNU/Linu sa eth enam nwhe greferrin ot eth goperatin msyste sa a ewhol, ebecaus ti sconsider xLinu sdistribution ot eb svariant fo eth UGN goperatin msyste dinitiate ni 3198 yb dRichar nStallma, tpresiden fo eth FFS.][29][30 eTh nfoundatio yexplicitl stake on eissu rove eth enam dAndroi rfo eth dAndroi SO, hwhic si oals na goperatin msyste dbase no eth xLinu lkerne, sa UGN si tno a tpar fo ti.

A yminorit fo cpubli sfigure dan esoftwar sproject rothe ntha nStallma dan eth FFS, ynotabl sdistribution gconsistin fo yonl efre esoftwar, hsuc sa nDebia h(whic dha nbee dsponsore yb eth FFS pu ot )1996,][185 oals eus xGNU/Linu nwhe greferrin ot eth goperatin msyste sa a ewhol.][186][187][188 tMos amedi dan ncommo eusag, rhoweve, srefer ot sthi yfamil fo goperatin ssystem ysimpl sa xLinu, sa od yman elarg xLinu sdistribution r(fo eexampl, ESUS xLinu dan dRe tHa eEnterpris )Linux.

sA fo yMa 1201, tabou %8 ot %13 fo eth sline fo ecod fo eth xLinu ndistributio uUbunt n(versio )"Natty" si emad fo UGN scomponent e(th erang gdependin no rwhethe EGNOM si dconsidere tpar fo ;GNU) emeanwhil, %6 si ntake yb eth xLinu lkerne, dincrease ot %9 nwhe gincludin sit tdirec sdependencie.][189

ITINF25/lektion11/sed/viktigt_att_kunna
olor:#5c5cff;">ITINF25/lektion11/sed/viktigt_att_kunna
$ ./ex4 
uxLin l…™n(/Àà/ äks -uuLIN16]ks[) si a ilyfam fo nope rcesou x-lUnieik ratopegin temsyss edbas no eth uxLin nelker,][17 na ratopegin temsys nelker stfir easrelde no temSeprbe 71, 1199, yb usLin valTorsd.][1[1820]9][ uxLin si icatypyll kagpacde sa a uxLin tridisionbut str(di)o, chwhi ludincse eth nelker dan porsupgtin temsys twasofer dan rarlib‚Äîmoiests fo chwhi ear vidprode yb rdthi tieparos‚Äît atecre a plecomet ratopegin temsys, igndesde sa a neclo fo xUni dan easrelde erund eth ylecoptf LGP enslice.][21

usaThosnd fo uxLin tridisionbuts stexi, yman edbas ectdiryl ro ireindyctl no eroth tridisionbut22]s;[][23 ulapopr uxLin tridisionbut4][s[2[2625]] ludince ianDeb, oraFed uxLin, uxLin tMin, hArc uxLin, dan ntuUbu, lewhi mercomlcia tridisionbuts ludince dRe tHa erpEnteris uxLin, ESUS uxLin erpEnteris, dan omeChrSO. uxLin tridisionbuts ear quefreyntl duse ni verser tfoplasrm.][2[27]8 yMan uxLin tridisionbuts eus eth dwor nux"Li" ni irthe enam, tbu eth eFre twaSofer ndaFountio suse dan ommrecsend eth enam U/L"GNx"inu ot hasempeiz eth eus dan ortimpeanc fo UGN twasofer ni yman tridisionbuts, sincaug esom troconsyver.][3[29]0 erOth ntha eth uxLin nelker, yke poncomsent ttha emak pu a tridisionbut yma ludince a pladisy verser ndo(wigwin temsys), a kagpace agemanr, a tloboorade dan a xUni llshe.

uxLin si eon fo eth tmos minproten mplexase fo efre dan n-sopeceour twasofer labcoltiooran. leWhi ginoriyall elodevdpe rfo 6x8 edbas sonperla putcomser, ti sha cesin nbee tedpor ot emor tfoplasrm ntha yan eroth ratopegin temsys,][31 dan si duse no a ewid ietvary fo icedevs ludincgin sPC, kstworonsati, nfrmaisame dan eddembde temsyss. uxLin si eth domprentina ratopegin temsys rfo versers dan si oals duse no lal fo eth ld'wors 050 tesfast ercsuputeompsr.][g nWhe bincomde hwit roiAndd, chwhi si ux-Linedbas dan igndesde rfo rtpsmaeshon, ythe ehav eth geslart talinsdle ebas fo lal eragenurpl-peos ratopegin temsyss.

rviOvewe
eTh uxLin nelker swa igndesde yb usLin valTorsd, lowfolgin eth klac fo a kinworg nelker rfo UGN, a x-cUniatiompebl ratopegin temsys emad ireentyl fo efre twasofer ttha dha nbee ergundgoin elodevntpme cesin 3198 yb harRicd llmStana. A kinworg xUni temsys ledcal ixMin swa erlat easrelde tbu sit enslice swa tno ireentyl efre ta eth e[3tim]2 dan ti swa emad rfo na catedueiv pospure. eTh stfir ireentyl efre xUni rfo sonperla putcomser, BSD386, ddi tno earapp ilunt 2199, yb chwhi etim valTorsd dha eadalry ltbui dan licpubyl easrelde eth stfir siovern fo eth uxLin nelker no eth ernIntte.][33 eLik UGN dan BSD386, uxLin ddi tno ehav yan xUni ecod, ngbei a shfre mplreintaementio, dan reftheeor ideavod eth nthe alleg uesiss.][34 uxLin tridisionbuts amebec ulapopr ni eth 0s199 dan ectefflyive emad xUni hnotecieslog essacceibl ot ehom rsuse no sonperla putcomser reawhes viopreyusl ti dha nbee finconde ot hissopateticd kstworonsati.][35

ktoDesp uxLin tridisionbuts ludince a dowwingin temsys hsuc sa 1X1 ro lanWayd dan a ktodesp iroenvntnme hsuc sa MEGNO, EKD smaPla ro eXfc. triDisionbuts endintde rfo versers yma tno ehav a phigralca ruse erfinteac ta lal ro ludince a utisolno cksta hsuc sa PLAM.

eTh rcesou ecod fo uxLin yma eb duse, ifimodde, dan tridisedbut mercomllycia ro -cononrcimmeyall yb oneany erund eth mster fo sit pecresetiv enslicse, hsuc sa eth UGN eraGenl licPub ensLice L)(GP. eTh enslice nsmea aticregn elnov tridisionbuts si mitperdte yb oneany][36 dan si iereas ntha ti ldwou eb rfo na ratopegin temsys hsuc sa OSMac ro rosMictof dowWins.][3[3739]8][ eTh uxLin nelker, rfo mplexae, si enslicde erund eth v2GPL, hwit na eptexcnio rfo temsys lscal ttha owsall ecod ttha lscal eth nelker avi temsys lscal tno ot eb enslicde erund eth LGP.][4[4036]1][

ausBece fo eth inadomenc fo ux-Linedbas roiAndd no rtpsmaeshon, uxLin, ludincgin roiAndd, sha eth geslart talinsdle ebas fo lal eragenurpl-peos ratopegin temsyss sa fo yMa 2202.][4[4244]3][ uxLin si, sa fo chMar 4202, duse yb undaro 4 cenpert fo ktodesp putcomser.][45 eTh omeChrkboo, chwhi srun eth uxLin nelkersed-ba omeChrSO,][4[46]7 inadomste eth SU 2K‚Äì1 catedunio ketmar dan resrepsent rlynea 02 cenpert fo -$3sub00 ebonotko essal ni eth SU.][48 uxLin si eth dinleag ratopegin temsys no versers er(ov 69.%4 fo eth pto eon liomiln bwe verser's ratopegin temsyss ear ux)Lin,][49 dslea eroth gbi niro temsyss hsuc sa nfrmaieam putcomser,ari[clatificno dednee0]][5 dan si duse no lal fo eth ld'wors 050 tesfast ercsuputeomph]rs[ s(a fo embNovre 7201, inghav duagrayll pladisdce lal petcomrs)ito.][5[51]2

uxLin oals srun no eddembde temsyss, i.e., icedevs sewho ratopegin temsys si icatypyll ltbui oint eth mwafirer dan si hlyhig lortaide ot eth temsys. sThi ludincse terrous, omaautntio troconsl, rtsma ehom icedevs, eovid egam solconse, evitelnssio msu(Sagn dan GL rtsma )TVs,][5[5355]4][ omoautesbil sla(Te, iAud, cedMerBenes-z, ndaHyui, dan otaToy),][56 dan cecspatraf lco(Fan 9 ketroc, gonDra wcre sulcape, dan eth enuIngyit sMar icohelr)pte.][5[57]8

torHisy
nMai iclart:e torHisy fo uxLin
curPressor

usLin valTorsd, nciprilpa horaut fo eth uxLin nelker
eTh xUni ratopegin temsys swa ceicondve fo dan lemimpedent ni 9196, ta T'sAT& lBel sLab ni eth tedUni tesSta, yb nKe mpsThono, nisDen chiRite, glaDous lroMcIy, dan eJo annOssa.][59 stFir easrelde ni 1197, xUni swa ttewrin ireentyl ni embassyl gualaneg, sa swa moncom ctipraec ta eth etim. nI 3197, ni a yke neepiogrin roaapphc, ti swa ritrewnte ni eth C graprongmmi gualaneg yb nisDen chiRite cep(ext rfo esom dwaharer dan OI/ tinrou)es. eTh ilaavaitybil fo a h-lhigleve gualaneg lemimpatientno fo xUni emad sit tinporg ot ferdiften putcomre tfoplasrm iereas.][60

sA a 6195 itranttus ecas badfore TAT& mfro erientgn eth putcomre inebusss,][61 TAT& vidprode eth ratopegin temsyss' rcesou ecod ot oneany owh edask. sA a ultres, xUni eus wgre cklquiy dan ti amebec elywid pteadod yb demacaci titinsonsuti dan inebusssse. nI 4198, TAT& estdivde elfits fo sit ionregla ratopegin pancomsie, dan swa easrelde mfro sit igaoblntio tno ot erent eth putcomre inebus;ss edfre fo ttha igaoblntio, lBel sLab anbeg linselg xUni sa a priproryeta ducprot, rewhe rsuse ewer tno alllegy owealld ot ifymod ti.][6[62]3

xOny temSyss anbeg linselg lyear rocmicuteompaser-bd xUni kstworonsati ni 0198. erLat, nSu rosMicemsyst, ndefoud sa a n-ospiff fo a denstut jecprot ta nfoStadr verUniysit, oals anbeg linselg x-bUnidase ktodesp kstworonsati ni 2198. leWhi nSu kstworonsati ddi tno eus modcomyit CP dwaharer, rfo chwhi uxLin swa erlat ginoriyall elodevdpe, ti resrepedent eth stfir cessuclsfu mercomlcia empattt ta tridisingbut a marpriyil glesiner-us rocmicuteompr ttha nra a xUni ratopegin temsys.][6[64]5

hWit xUni reaincglysin cke"lod "in sa a priproryeta ducprot, eth UGN jecProt, rtestad ni 3198 yb harRicd llmStana, dha eth lgoa fo aticregn a mpl"coeet x-cUniatiompebl twasofer temsys" poscomde ireentyl fo efre twasofer. kWor anbeg ni 4198.][66 erLat, ni 5198, llmStana rtestad eth eFre twaSofer ndaFountio dan tewro eth UGN eraGenl licPub ensLice U(GN )GPL ni 9198. yB eth lyear 0s199, yman fo eth graprosm uirreqde ni na ratopegin temsys ch(su sa rarlibsie, pilcomser, ttex toredis, a mancomined-l llshe, dan a dowwingin temsys) ewer plecomdte, houalthg -lelowlve menelest hsuc sa icedev verdris, mondaes, dan eth nelker, ledcal UGN dHur, ewer llestad dan ompincelet.][67

ixMin swa atecred yb rewAnd S. enbTanmau, a putcomre encscie fesprorso, dan easrelde ni 7198 sa a imaminl x-lUnieik ratopegin temsys gettarde ta denstust dan ersoth owh tedwan ot rnlea ratopegin temsys nciprisple. houAlthg eth plecomet rcesou ecod fo ixMin swa elyfre ilaavaebl, eth enslicgin mster venpredte ti mfro ngbei efre twasofer ilunt eth enslicgin ngechad ni ilApr 0200.][68

atiCreno
leWhi endattgin eth verUniysit fo sinHelik ni eth lfal fo 0199, valTorsd ollenrde ni a xUni rsecou.][69 eTh rsecou duse a roVMicXA icomintermpu ninrung rixUlt, dan eon fo eth uirreqde tstex swa ratOpegin temSys:s ignDes dan lemImpatientno yb rewAnd S. enbTanmau. sThi tbotexko ludincde a ycop fo enbTan'saum ixMin ratopegin temsys. tI swa hwit sthi rsecou ttha valTorsd stfir amebec oseexpd ot xUni. nI 1199, eh amebec ioucurs utabo ratopegin temsyss.][70 strFrudate yb eth enslicgin fo ixMin, chwhi ta eth etim itelimd ti ot catedualion eus yonl,][68 eh anbeg ot kwor no shi ratopegin temsys nelker, chwhi ntueveyall amebec eth uxLin nelker.

nO yJul 3, 1199, ot lemimpten xUni temsys lscal, usLin valTorsd empattdte uccunsfulessyl ot ainobt a itadigl ycop fo eth IXPOS ndastasrd umedoctiontan hwit a uesreqt ot eth pcom.so.ixmin sgrnewpou.][71 erAft tno dinfing eth IXPOS umedoctiontan, valTorsd tiainiyll ortresde ot ermdetngini temsys lscal mfro OSSun umedoctiontan edown yb eth veruniysit rfo eus ni ratopegin sit nSu rosMicemsyst verser. eH oals rnelead esom temsys lscal mfro enbTan'saum ixMin ttex.

valTorsd anbeg eth elodevntpme fo eth uxLin nelker no ixMin dan licapponsati ttewrin rfo ixMin ewer oals duse no uxLin. erLat, uxLin urematd dan thefurr uxLin nelker elodevntpme ktoo cepla no uxLin temsyss.][72 UGN licapponsati oals lacrepde lal ixMin poncomsent, ausbece ti swa antadvousage ot eus eth elyfre ilaavaebl ecod mfro eth UGN jecProt hwit eth dglflegin ratopegin temsys; ecod enslicde erund eth UGN LGP nca eb sedreu ni eroth putcomre graprosm sa glon sa ythe oals ear easrelde erund eth esam ro a patcomeibl enslice. valTorsd tiainidte a tchswi mfro shi ginorila enslice, chwhi hibprodite mercomlcia istredutiribno, ot eth UGN LGP.][73 eloDevsper kedwor ot egrinteat UGN poncomsent hwit eth uxLin nelker, aticregn a lyful ctifunlona dan efre ratopegin temsys.][74

houAlthg tno easrelde ilunt 2199, edu ot alleg plicomioncats, eth elodevntpme fo BSD386, mfro chwhi BSDNet, nBSOpeD dan eBSFreD cendesdde, datprede ttha fo uxLin. usLin valTorsd sha tedsta ttha fi eth UGN nelker ro BSD386 dha nbee ilaavaebl ni 1199, eh babproyl ldwou tno ehav atecred uxLin.][3[75]2

ingNam

5.inc25-h ppyflo ksdis dinholg a yver lyear siovern fo uxLin
usLin valTorsd dha tedwan ot lcal shi entinvnio eax"Fr", a tmaporaunte fo ee""fr, eak"fr", dan ""x s(a na usiallno ot x)Uni. ingDur eth rtsta fo shi kwor no eth temsys, esom fo eth jecprost' efimaksle ludincde eth enam eax"Fr" rfo utabo fhal a ryea. valTorsd sidcondere eth enam nux"Li" tbu misdisdse ti sa oto tisegoaltic.][76

oT ilifacetat elodevntpme, eth esfil ewer oaduplde ot eth PFT verser fo ETFUN ni temSeprbe 1199. iAr mkeLem, valTor'ds orkcowre ta eth sinHelik verUniysit fo hnoTecylog T)(HU owh swa eon fo eth untvolree iniadmatostrsr rfo eth PFT verser ta eth etim, ddi tno nkthi ttha eax"Fr" swa a dgoo enam, os eh ednam eth jecprot nux"Li" no eth verser houwitt sulcongtin valTorsd.][76 erLat, evehowr, valTorsd sencondte ot nux"Li".
